Her slender hands assail your underarms with enthusiasm all their own, scratching speedily- up, down, up down, up, down, painted nails scraping along the hapless nerves with fanatical determination.
         "Ahahahahahah! Stop! Stopstopstopstopstop! Ahahahahahahahaha! Wh-yyy-ahahahahahaha! No! Wahahahahaha! Plea-haheaze! Ahahahahah!"" You beg pointlessly, as if just to make yourself feel better with the knowledge that you're not completely helpless; you can still use your voice, if not your body. Ms. Lab coat is unfazed, pressing on you from behind, long brown hair trailing around your shoulders, fingers never slowing the electrifying onslaught.
         "That's right, little boy; beg. Plead. Yell for mercy lonnnggg and loud." Her voice drops lower, more conspiratory, her lips just faintly brushing the edge of your ear. "It will all be for nothing. You're never getting out of here, and, oh, you're just so helpless. You don't have the strength to resist. Eventually, you'll give up. They all do..."
         Even with your head thrown back and stuck there, even spewing out laughter in tsunamic waves, even with her soft voice almost vanishing in a patient, assured purr, you hear her clearly. A spark of indignation catches in your gut; you shock yourself when you redouble the efforts to retrieve your limbs, yanking at the leather cuffs ferociously. A pale hand flashes down, striking something on the chair adjacent your lower back. "Oh no, hehe" you say as you realise the goop is tickling you

It feels like feathers, claws, and fingers are all moving across your feet and between your toes, and you can only sit there and laught

This goes on for 10 minutes until...
112122.title: Tickle goop

choices: Wait ten more minutes! After a half hour they must notice you!
1121222.content: The time passed but nothing happened. The goop going on tickle you and as longer as it was at your feet, that more it statredt to tickle you. You twist your toes and shiver in laugh but nothing happened still as the next ten minutes passed.
1121222.title: Goop Goop

choices: Try your luck with the box
11212221.content: You laughed and shakes yourself many times and felt a bit weak as after ten more minutes the door opens again and the scientist comes in, with a tall thing, covered that you can't see, what its in. The Flamedramon smiles at you and took some of the goop and rub it between his fingers, smiling. "Nice, the content is still wet and slippery. The Mixture is better as i have thought...." He looks at you, smiles big. "You have now two choices. You can either continue with the goo or you get to volunteer to use my other invention..." He taek the cover and pull it away and a box with two holes can be seen. The Flamedramon smiles and pushes it toward your feet, smiling. "What is your choice?"
11212221.title: Notice the new device.....

choices: Try and shift the table to get close to the stove?
Surrender to the mercy of goop tickling you?
112122211.content:
Flamedramon sighed.
`Oh, well looks like I'll have to put this back on again!'
You look helplessly at him and you wish you could hit yourself for making the wrong decision. Flamedramon walks over to you and places the gel between your toes.
`I'm going to have my dinner, see you in an hour!' he said. `But before I go I'll be generous and give you another one!'
He walks over to bottle on a table and walks back over to you. He then unscrews the lid and turns the bottle upside down tipping the second gel blob onto your foot. He puts the bottle onto the table and walks out the room, closely the door behind him.

It didn't take long before both gels took action. You try and hold your breath but the tickling is too much for you to handle. You suddenly burst out laughing and tears start pouring from your eyes. But then you notice a small lit stove with the fire showing. Could these gel blobs perhaps be vulnerable to a bit of fire?
112122211.title: Goop Tickle 2nd Round

1121222112.content:
As you contemplate about using the stove, the tickling continues to increase. You try to get to the stove, but the tickling soon becomes unbearable, and you find yourself laughing harder than ever. You decide that you might as well just give in to the tickling.

An hour passes and......
1121222112.title: Surrender to the mercy of goop tickling you?

choices: someone finds you and saves you
11212221121.content: Flamedrmon comes back with a grin. He gets some more of that goop and dumped the bottle on your belly and says I'll be back in 2 hours. The goop kicked in so now both your feet and belly were being tickled you try to fight it but realize that you can't escape so you give in and then...
11212221121.title: The Flamedramon comes back in.

112122212.content:
"Just get this stuff off me!" You have surprisingly little trouble talking between your giggles.

"Now we're talking!" Flamedramon pours a bit of liquid on a paintbrush and wastes no time painting it on your feet. The stiff brustles tickle decidedly more than the goo, but it is over soon. He forcefully curls your massive feet downward to guide them into the box. "You still havn't gotten a good look at your new feet, have you?" His tone is eerily playful. You do not respond. "I think we can fix that."
112122212.title: Take the box

1121222121.content:
A loud, dangerous-sounding crackle booms from the box. You struggle to remove your feet, but obviously cannot. Suddenly, the box lifts upwards on a pedistool leaving two stumps at the ends of your legs. You shriek in terror and struggle fruitlessly to pull your legs out of the manacles. It isn't until Flamedramon briefly tickles your tummy that you even begin to calm down.

Your seat suddenly begins to change. What was a reclining position quickly becomes an uncomfortablly upright kneel. The box reaches eye level, which Flamedramon spins around and pushes up inches from your face.

Flamedramon is chuckling now. "You have absolutely no idea what's going on, do you?" You shake your head violently. He pulls off the side and top panels, throwing them to the floor with aggrevating clangs. Finally, he slides away the barrier directly in front of your face to reveal your soles.

Your soles sit only six inches away from your snout. You use one foot to carefully scratch the other sole and you find yourself torn. On one hand, you are panicked and surely about to be tortured. On the other, damn if your new feet arn't cute. Meaty toes perched ontop of soft, wrinkly soles which lead to tight little heels. You stretch your fresh toes to see how the skin responds. The massive feet are more than large enough to reach the pads of your toes all the way to your snout, so you let them.
1121222121.title: The box of... something

11212221212.content: Your tongue glides between your plump toes without any rhyme or reason. Strong and round, they hold up to the licking well. You don't know which part is better: putting your tongue between those toes, or feeling that tongue between them. The moment your tongue retracts to moisten, Flamedramon pulls your toes up and slides the contraption closer. Your tonge drags up your mighty arches now; a single line of drool slies down to your heel.
11212221212.title: Go fig

choices: Gatomon hops up onto your tummy
1122.content:
A gatomon stands in the doorway.

"Wow, you turned out well! Total transformation, and just as red as you should be. Don't see that often enough." Gatomon quickly approaches while taking off her gloves. "You know what the most important quality of a Guilmon is , don't you?"
1122.title: The Gatomon Cometh

11221.content: There ticklish! Cries Gotamon as she starts to tickle your tummy. You laugh very loud trying to escape but its no good. She gets off and walks out a door.
11221.title: The Tickling

112211.content:
You muster up all your strength into your legs and wrists. You manage to break the bonds and stealthily escape. You moved fast, so fast that the camera wasn't able to see you.
[Meanwhile in the Cam Operator Room]

The operator for Guilmon's room came back with his Bacon Cheeseburger from Five Guys, he almost gagged when he saw that the subject was free. He hit the alarm button and sirens that can dismember your eardrums activated. Guilmon ran into the same Gatomon that tickled him.
112211.title: Here We Go

1122112.content:
You run straight into the unlucky gatomon, bowling her over and sending her flying. A few feet farther along, you abruptly skid to a halt on the carpet, turn around and run back the way you just came. Gatomon's busy picking herself up off the floor: "Wait; was that the same guilmon I just-Mmpff!"

          She is rudely cut off as you hit her again, this time with a side-on tackle instead of a casual body-check. Knocked backed to the carpet on her front, you quickly slide over her lower back and pin her arms between your knees, against her furry body. "Heay-a, gatomon. I was passing through here, when I seemed to recall that you tickle-tortured me when I was tied up a few minutes ago. Sooo, I decided to knock you over and get some serious payback," You can see gatomon, eyes wide with surprised fright, open her mouth to call for help or make a demand that you let her up- or something slightly less printable.
          You swiftly wrap the end of your thick tail over it, the tough scales nullifying the force of her bites. "Hope you don't mind; it's only fair." You add, lowering your large claws to her side and beginning to probe, patiently measuring her struggling and the pitch of her cutely outraged Mmphs!

          She shakes side to side, twisting her arms futilely as you give the sides of her soft belly a few firm squeezes, before moving on to knead her ribs, and finally sticking a claw on each hand into the top of the groove formed by her arms against her body and wiggling them gently...

          She nearly manages to buck you off with her panicked thrashing. "Nooo!! Hahahaah! Not my unhahahaderaharms! Ha-Hmph!" She gets out, before you adjust your gagging appendage.
          Delighted, you relax your hold on her arms, until you have her caught only by the wrists. She instinctively pulls her arms out farther, taking advantage of the slack as you goose and tease her sides-and affording you more room.
          You can now fit nearly your entire hand into her underarms, and you take full advantage of this, going crazy on the helpless hollows. Pausing briefly, you continue tickling her underarms with one hand, tucking your other under her belly proper, and begin squeezing away. Leaning forward, you keep her desperate struggling to a minimum while pressing her soft skin into your wiggling fingers.

          You soon tire of that, however, and desiring to keep her off-balance, you revert your full attention to her armpits. As you scratch and drag away, her small, padded feet do a heavy drum roll on the carpet, almost audibly calling for some attention...
1122112.title: (Well, how would you define 'jump'?)

11221122.content:
A coil of mechanical tubes- ending in multi digited metallic hands- wraps around you middle, pinioning your own arms to your sides and lifting you off the floor. Craning your head around, you can see the chunky shape of the tread-well footed robot that's caught you.

          Gatomon, meanwhile, rolls over, giggling and panting heavily. Apparently equipped with some impressive stamina, she springs back to her paws and walks towards you menacingly after only a few seconds.
          "Tickle me back, would you? I'll show you!" The robot loops and extra coil of limb over your snout, gagging you as it takes the liberty of replying on your behalf.
          "That will not be necessary at this time, Chloe."

'Chloe' steps back, crossing her arms and cocking her fuzzy head to the side.
          "Hunh? What's that supposed to mean, SF?"
You struggle in the droid's menagerie of mechanical limbs as they talk, and it casually wraps more tentacles around you and slings you against it's side like one would hold a naughty toddler.

          "This Lee was put in your charge, and he temporarily escaped, as I presume you have noticed. As per Bing Decree number 17, section 4, paragraph 3," SF's voice changes abruptly to a more ‘organic’ sounding recording. " 'Oh and while I'm at this stuff- You know all those Lers out there? While, if their little victims get out and start running around when they're on the clock, then I want you to catch them and tickle them alongside the Lees for not keeping them in the stocks and what-not like they‘re s’posed to. Got it? Also-' " The recording cuts of, and SF's high pitched mechanical buzz resumes. "Thus, I shall have to take you to the nearest restraint chamber for tickling post-haste."

Gatomon looks disappointed but not overtly bothered by the sentence.
          "All right then. I'm comin', I'm comin'. I still think that whoever locked him in there in the first place ought’a take the rap instead of me. " To your slight annoyance, SF doesn't even bother to restrain her as it whirrs back down the hallway with you in it's stead-fast grip.

          Several turns and a flight of stairs later, the robot leads the way into another room. The far wall is composed mostly of full-length bay windows that look out onto a grassy field, which gives way after a few hundred feet to cliffs that in turn drop down to a long beach of white sand.
          The bright setting and scenic view is highly at odds with the various alarming restraints that are scattered like so many exercise-machines across the thickly matted floor. Still proving immune to your struggles, SF casually rolls across the over and binds you to a cushioned device shaped like a divan, with you feet straight out in front of you in a set of stocks on one end, and wrists bound up on either side of your head as you sit more-or-less 'up' a the other. Finally, it removes the impromptu gag from around your snout and helps Chloe lock her hands between her paws into a set of stocks, before scooting wordlessly out the door.
          "Well then, this is annoying. How do we get out of here?" You say after an awkward few moments of quiet waiting and squirming.

          '"Well, I just have to put up with being tickled for an hour or so by anybody who walks by before they'll let me out of here. You on the other hand... It might be a few days before they let you out and beam you back wherever you came from. Hope you've got good stamina."

          "I just wish that thing had let me pick how I was going to be tied up like you- though I would have preferred not at all. Being stretched out like this makes me kind of nervous, I'll admit."

Chloe flexes her little kitty-feet nervously.
          "Yeah, I always prefer having my feet tickled to anywhere else, even when I was younger, before I came here. That's why I prefer stocks and things like that."

          "Ah. I don't have much of a history of tickling one way or the other myself- and, uh, incidentally, just where are we?" You ask, looking out of the window as a small flock of seagulls with suspiciously outsize wings swoop past.

          "Bing's Tickle Mansion, HQ of most things ticklee. I've been working here for a while as a tick-Ler for them. They'll teleport someone in and then tickle them or something like that for a while. I don't know exactly where we are geographically, or where half of the inmates actually come from, though I once heard the term 'spatially confused' to describe it. But don't worry; as I said, they'll send you back where you came from in a while and-" She is cut off as someone barges in through the open door and
11221122.title: Security!

112212.content: You stay waiting. After 25 minutes, you start to get sleepy. You...
112212.title: More Waiting

1122121.content: Congradulations, you fall asleep. When you wake up, someone is tickling your feet. It is...
1122121.title: Fall asleep

11221211.content:
Im Back! She says

She...
11221211.title: Gatomon again

choices: You try to talk to her through laughter
You stay like this until she stops
112212111.content: Gatomon approches your feet. She tickles them so hard you can't hold your laughter in. You burst out laughing. you don't know what to do, so you just keep on laughing as she tickles your feet.
112212111.title: Tickles your feet

11222.content:
Gatomon pinches lightly at your left sole, and you try to pull away. Of course, you cannot, and she digs deeper into your sole. She tunnels right to the nerve, and you can feel your face getting hotter. Your breath catches in your throat and it becomes hard to breath. She pulls back your fleshy toes and skittles her other paw down your foot. What did you do to deserve this? She circles your foot and brushes along the outside edge of your sole. Why won't she stop! You want to die. You wish your feet were not your own. She brushes the bases of your toes, and that's the cincher. You scream like a girl and beg when you can, but it will do no good. How could such light touches drive you mad? You can hear her talking, but you can't tell what she is saying with your blood pounding in your ears. Finally, she slows down and lets you catch your breath.

"Aww. Your so cuuutee," She cooes and plants a kiss on your foot.
11222.title: The shoe's on your foot, now

choices: Maybe now you can get out of here
112221.content:
"Mmm. You don't taste bad," mumbles Gatomon.

Before you realize what she is talking about, she licks your left foot again, right along the ball. Her tongue jumps to the inside of your right instep and scrapes her rough tongue along it. Your foot jerks and nearly kicks her in the face, but she pulls back and takes a moment to let her tongue moisten. Gatomon grabs you by the toes and you watch apprehensively. She sticks her slick, wiggling tongue between your meaty toes and you yip. She licks along the underside of your toes and you hit a new octive. She pulls all four of your toes and lets her tongue dance between your feet white her fingers unintentionally tickle your toes. Your body is shaking now, but you don't care. You don't even know if you're laughing any more. All you know is that it tickles way too much for you to bare. Suddenly, you realize she has stopped and is laying down on your stomach.

"Listen. I'm a prisoner here, too. We can help each other out." The words take time to register.

"What? Why... didn't you ask me in the first place?"

"I had to make it look good for the camera," and she motions to a small camera in the corner of the room. "It will turn off as soon as I hit that button on the wall. Then we can get out of here." Gatomon gives you a last tickle on your neck and jumps off your tummy.
112221.title: Gatomon gets her licks in

1122211.content:
Gatomon opens the door to make it look like she is leaving while hitting the button. She wheels back around.

"Let's get you out of there."

Gatomon starts fooling around underneath the chair. After a moment, she whips her head towards the door.
1122211.title: A friend in need

11222112.content:
"What the hell are you doing?" A cranky Elecmon stands in the doorway.

"I left my feather here yesterday, and the damn thing vanished!" Gatomon snapped back without missing a beat.

"Are you sure it was in this room?"

"Either here or the next room over. I had them back to back." Gatomon jumps up and maneuvers around him to the door, opens it, and hits the button. "Hey, can you give this box a shot? It might have gotten to the back, and I can't reach that far without putting my head in there.

"Sure," says the Elecmon, with a slight smile across his face. Gatomon leaves, but leaving the door open a crack. Elecmon comes over, reaches under the seat, looks up at your feet, and gives them a quick tickle. Your body shutters and you yip involuntarily. He digs his other hand into your other pudgy sole, and you frantically try to force your toes down to slow him down. He starts tickling the tops of your feet with quick fingers, and you let a foot back up. He grabs those toes and runs his other hand along your wrinkly sole. You cannot escape a single movement; this guy is a pro. He falls down on the floor with a clunk, and gatomon stands behind him with a large candlestick.

"So much for that. We should take off before he wakes up or someone gets suspicious."

Gatomon rolls him aside with a high grunt and reaches below the chair once again. Your bonds open and you immediately scratch your poor feet. Gatomon backs out and Elecmon rolls back to where he was.
11222112.title: The Interloper

choices: To find another pair of feet
112221121.content:
You decide to leave before you get caught, but first you tie Elecmon so he doesn't try to follow you when he wakes up.

"So what do we do now?" you ask the Gatomon.

"Just follow me. I know where the exit is." You follow her down an empty hallway, but you notice that she keeps sneaking peeks at your feet.

"Why do you keep looking at my feet?"

"No reason," she says. "So, since I'm leading you out of here, do I get a reward?"

"W-what do you want?" you ask nervously.

"Hmmm, I think I want..."
112221121.title: A Price to Pay

1122211211.content:
"What?!" you exclaim. Didn't she get her fair share before.

"That's the deal: those smooth, delectable soles or nothing."

"Okay fine! After we get out I'll-"

"Nope, I want them now!" Geez she sure is rude.

"*Sigh* alright."

"Good. Now follow me into my old chamber. There's plenty of privacy in there." She winks at you. She then leads you to a room with only one thing in it: a device for tickling. "Lay down on it."

"Okay, okay!" As you walk and lay down on the device, she looks at your angelic feet. She then hit a button that trapped your wrists and ankles.

"W-why'd you do that?!"

"It's just so you don't move a lot. Lighten up!" The Gatomon then moves up to your feet, rubbing them with her gloved hands. "Hmm such nice, big, moist feet."

"Moist?!" As soon as you realized what she was saying, she started licking your red feet. You laughed hystarically as she dragged her tongue all over your soles.

"Yummy! They taste-" She paused to smell your feet, "and smell delicious. And they look so beautiful!"

"Wait, why are you doing this to my feet?!"

"Well..." she looked a little embaressed. "I have a foot fetish, and these feet match my... tastes." She then removes her gloves and caresses your feet, earining giggles from you. "I wonder how those meaty little toes taste!" She went to your toes and started sucking, nibbling, and kissing everywhere around your toes. She then...
1122211211.title: The Deal

11222112112.content: She stops for a minute, letting you recover. Then she starts to massage your feet. "Mmmm how does that feel?", she asks. "Good. Now can we get outta here?", you ask. "Not yet! You ain't weaseling outta this deal easily!", she smiles with a demonic smirk on her face. She then wiggles her worm-like fingers on your feet. You scream like a banshee, while also serving a banshee's purpose (a banshee screams warning of impending death). You continually scream as Gatomon wiggles her diabolical fingers all over your soft, and ticklish feet. You scream as if you were literally being torn apart under an abundance of pressure. You were close to dying. Of laughter. You were about to cross over to your subconscious, possibly your afterlife. Until, Gatomon stops. "Okay, that's enough. Now let's get out of here.", Gatomon says. You slowly try to regain as much of your strength from that traumatic experience. When you were walking to your exit, still feeling the shock of that horrible time, you spy an enemy. Gatomon and you sneaked through the guard, inching closer to your goal with every step. Finally, from what seemed like 100 years of wandering through these cursed halls you spot the exit.
11222112112.title: Trickery

choices: At Gatomon's House, Tied to a bed.
112221121121.content: You boost all of your strength to maximum capability, and invested it all in your speed. You charged at the door at 160 mph, leaving behind the Gatomon. Not. She hung on to your tail, and you were able to run all the way to the threshold of Lost Forest. Gatomon, which was still catching her breath, began scolding you for your recklessness. "What the hell was that!? I nearly god beheaded because of the speed you were running at. God!" "Well, anything to get outta that hellhole, right.?", you reply. "Well, this is where we part. Goodbye." Gatomon stops you, "Do you think our time is really up? I mean come on, I just tickled you twice. You ain't getting farther if I were to help it!", Gatamon grabs your feet and you hit the ground. Hard, that the impact made you lose consciousness. You wake up...
112221121121.title: Charge

choices: Find a secluded spot to go to work.
Just keep her mouth covered and tickle her right there!
1122211212.content:
"I want to play around with someone else's feet before we leave. Even if I was forced to do it to you last time, it still was pretty fun. Heck, I'd probably have done it anyways if they just left me in there without telling me what to do." She declares unabashadly, not even turning to look at you while you jog through the luxuriantly decorated hallway.
         You sigh, thinking that staying to go foothunting is dangerous, but you're not going to argue. "Okay. You obviously have a rough idea what's going on here; you knew there was a camera. Where do you think we could find somebody to torture?" Gatomon looks up at you and grins slyly. "I've got just the 'mon in mind..."


Not long after, your both crouching in an alcove partially blocked by a long heavy tapestry, in a different corridor. "This is madness!" You insist, but sotly. From the way the digimon in the middleof the chamber-actually, it's really more of a circular bulge in the corridor walls- is ordering around several other individuals-not all just mons-she must be important. I takes you a second to recognize how she seems familiar... Then you realize she looks alot like Ranamon, but with a darker, bluer skin tone. That would explain the unique outfit, and the group of disembodied hands, either carrying and/or ferrying items, jotting down notes, or some other menial task. Maybe their related or something. "We're going after her? How are we supposed to nab her? 'Specially when she can summon those hand, and is surrounded by her entire entourage?"
         "Relax. I don't want to mess with her. Actually, yu' see that other Gatomon over there? She tortured me when I woke up. I admit that a bunch of the stuff I used on you earlier comes from recently learning it first hand; her hands. And now I want to see just how ticklish she is!" A human, wearing a short-skirt and a tee- walks up to the Ranamon look-a-like. She's carrying a clipboard, and looks nervous about something. They talk, and suddenly Ranamon yells at her. You manage to hear: "Escape...moron...cell #87?...two...find them...firstly..." She snaps her fingers, and the dozen hands leave off what they were doing to move up to the human. Appearing quite scared, she backs away from the ghostly pack, shaking her head. After a moment of aiming, they all fly at her, a pair going to each of her arms and legs, hoisting her off the floor and stretching her out at just above waist level. 'Ranamon' saunters up beside her, and reaches a signle finger down, slowly drawing up her hapless underling's shirt and exposing her cute belly. The girl, seeming quite desperate, says something else, making her superior grin maliciously and start to trace lazy spirals over her belly. The human starts giggling uncontrollably, and the mon orders two of her spair hands in to go at her plaything's sides, while the others pair slips off her shoes. She steps back though from the victim writhing in midair, and gesturing to the girl, smiles at the Gatomon, enjying the spectacle with the rest of those gathered in the chamber. She eagerly scratches at the humans bare soles, and the new struggling and pleading produced has the other assembled humans, anthros, and mons laughing along tauntingly. While pulling her toes back and brushing in the tender areas between them with her long, fuzztipped tail, she turns back to the Ranamon resembler. They talk-something which doesn't hinder the torturous, capable gatomon in the least, despite being distracted- and then the smaller mon bows and leaves, letting an eager cobra takeover. The gatomon hurries straight towards the hallway where you're lying-in-wait. "Perfect! We'll reach out, nabb her, and then drag her in here. With those other fiends distracted, we'll be miles away before any of them get suspicious."Exclaims the friendly gatomon. Still thinking this to be an unnesecarry risk, you tense, bringing your arms up. Humming to herself happily, and occaisionally firing longing stares back at where the hapless human's being disciplined, the small mon strides right up to you. Fear of getting caught lends you extra speed, and you have one hand on the unlucky gatomon's shoulder, the other on her mouth, and are dragging her in before she has a chance to yell.
         Her frantic squirming ceases abruptly and her eyes go wide when she notices her holders, particularli the gatomon, grinning triumphantly. A sudden increase in the volume of the unlucky girl's laughing and pleading for mercy in the room proper reminds you where you are, and you glance up nervously as you pull the tapestry across abit farther, helping your accomplice pull the prize into the deep shadows of the alcove.
1122211212.title: Retaliationary strike.

11222112121.content:
Keeping your victim's cries carefully muffled, you drag her over to a doorway concealed by the tapestry, opening it to reveal a spiral staircase. "You're sure there's nothing down there?" You ask G1 nervously.
She tuts. "Of course I'm sure. Hardly anyone uses these passages, and I know they lead to a few places that should come in handy for what we're going to do." She winks at your captive, and tickles her belly a little, before leading the way down.

         You can see why no one would use this way- the ceiling is low and the smooth stone walls are cramped, even for a 'mon such as yourself, and there are few light sources. You descend a fair distance on the stirs, struggling to maintain your hold on G2, until G1 stops you at a doorless side-closet, with a man-hold in the floor it's only feature. G1 opens it, "Okay, toss her in here, then follow me down. It's time to have some fun with our friend here!" You quickly obey, holding your questions in, and watch as G1 taps a few buttons on an unobtrusive device on the wall, causing a pixilated restraint to appear on the palm-sized screen. "There! now watch this!" She leaps down the hole, and you curiously follow.

         The room below is circular and not much larger than a closet, and the floor is covered in firm, green goo. G2 is restrained in a set of stocks with her arms sticking upt o form a 'v', all made of the same substance andextending from the floor. But she's glaring a the both of you, but still looks a little scared and apprehensive to you. "You'll never get away with this!" She declares. "When the Doctor catches you, you'll be tickled to death! You'll-"
"Oh, I hardly think it's a foregone conclusion." Grins G1. "the only question remains-should we start slowly and save the best for last, or just dig in right away?"
11222112121.title: Find a secluded spot to go to work.

112221122.content:
"Let's let him wake up. Can you resize this chair?" A slow smile creeps across Gatomon's face. She hops over to the chair and rapidly starts turning knobs and moving parts around. After only a few moments, The chair looks completely different.

"Go ahead and throw him in. No way I could throw that lardball that high." You grab elecmon on either side, suprised at his weight, and have to lean back to get him off the ground. After some careful repositions, you have him in place on the seat. It still has a flat back, but now it holds his arms out to their sides. He looks more sleeping than passed out, but you can already see the point of contact turning colors.

1122211222.content:
"Wake up, sleepyhead..." you tease as you drum your claws on his broad sides. He does not stir until you pull your hands back towards you as well.

"Hyyeeeah!! This isn't funny!"

"Yes it is!" sings gatomon from behind you. You start pinching and prodding down by his hips. He pulls away from each contact and dances around. You skittle up to right below his neck and rake your claws around. He starts shaking faster, and his body is trembling now. Elecmon doesn't bother pleading, and he is about to turn purple from holding his breath. You swirl a couple claws around his fluffy belly, but he does not crack. A swipe along his armpit doesn't do it either. Poking around his side, he nearly jumps off the table and squeaks.

"I didn't tiiiihhhaaaaaa!!"

"Whaaaaaat? I can't hear you," you tease while kneading his ribs.

"IDIDN'TTICKEYOUTHISMUCH!!" He says it like he was coming up for breath from a swim.

"I forgot all about that- I was just having fun! Now, I have to punish."

You climb up to kneel on either side of his platform, sitting on his legs. Your assault knows no bounds. His fluffy tummy, his thick hips, his fatty armpits, and his smooth neck all get their treatment. You find that his hips are actually the worst for him, so you lay several quick swipes and prods. He is nearly screaming now. Only his own exhaustion holds him back.

"Give these feet a try before he passes out!" Gatomon giggles, tormenting him with scratching claws. You turn off of Elecmon and land with your face an inch from the twisting paw that Gatomon had abandoned for you. As soon as you swipe along it just once, he passes out.

Gatomon only smiles. She jumps up on his belly, throws the pill in his mouth, and plugs his nose with two fingers. After a moment, Elecmon begins to sputter and swollows the pill. The surprise wakes him up.

11222112221122111111.content:
Haven't you two been in a similar situation before? It is a good feeling to get your revenge on this tricky Gatomon. You know she wouldn't hesitate to give you a hard time if the roles were reversed. You decide to really teach her a lesson.

After continuing with the feather for another 5 minutes, you stop and throw it away. Gatomon doesn't understand. You walk to a locker with more equipment and without anyone forcing you to, you take out some lotion and some stiff brushes, and you're delighted to find some duct tape and electric massagers too.

"What- what-whaat" - she yelps as you start working the lotion into her soles. You take the duct tape and attach the massagers to her soles.

"What are you doing" she whimpers. "you don't need to go that far."

"Oh, I'm sorry" you say. "I'm just - what was it? - making it look good for the camera. We gotta give these people their show, didn't you say so?" Her jaw drops. You force her arms above her head and apply more rope and duct tape. She looks a bit scared but you see she is still not taking you seriously. Well, she's got all the time in the world to learn. You switch on the massagers and she starts laughing. While the little devices work their magic on her soles and toes, you walk to her underarms, and dig your fingers into them. She jumps, and tries to pull down her arms but you tied her well.

"Don't get too comfy yet" you mock her. "This is only the beginning. When we're done you're gonna be the Mansion's no. 1 ticklee star."

"Who are you?" she ask fearfully. "Why are you so evil to me? I was only funning with you!"

"And now I ensure that you have plenty of fun. Isn't sharing nice?"

You can see that being tickled in four places at once is giving her a hard time, but you're still not satisfied. You don't just want to exhaust her, you want to scare her and make her submit to you. You wonder if you could ask the people running this place to move her to a better equipped room where you could REALLY torment her. They usually seem compliant with people who think like them.

armidilomon begins slurping in between gabumon's toes and he goes ballistic! then Gabumons toes all of a sudden curls down on armidillomons tongue. " OUCH.". armidillomon says calmly. 113111.content:
From the way the muzzled wolf struggles you can tell he wants out but those stretched out feet loot too ticklish to resist. Reaching up with one hand you give a quick stroke down his left sole. The reaction was immediate and strong, he tried to jerk away but his feet where kept perfectly still by the restraints. Building some more confidence you reach up with both hands and start scribbling all over. "Mmmphhhhahahaha" he cries as you find a particularly sweet spontaneous just under his big toes.

Suddenly two metal cuffs shoot out from the chair thing and secure your hands where they are. In shock you stop tickling and try to struggle free. Your so distracted that you don't notice as to cuffs for your feet and a muzzle lower down from the same device and before you know it you stuck standing up without being able to move your legs or feet, your hands trapped underneath the wolf feet and a muzzle stopping you from speaking.

Once you give up on trying to escape a small screen lowers on the screen where words that read a s follows: and so the games begin. Serves you right for being so cruel. Now here is what your going to do. If you look up you will see a small key hole behind the wolfs feet. Once a key is inserted and tuned you will lowered and released. However the only way to get that key is to pump water into a tank behind you and the only way to get pump the water is to get the wolf to struggle up and down which if you look up again will move the seat he's attached to up and down which is attached to the pump. And finally the only way to make him struggle is to...well...I think you can finger it out. Finally if you don't make it with in 2 minuets then you will be looked into a chamber with some devilishly ticklish devices for an hour. Good luck and with that a timer flashed up onto the screen and started counting down from 2 minuets. The device your attached to suddenly lifts you up and starts moving forwards at a steady pace. Looking in front of you, you see a small chamber filled with brushes: all perfectly placed to get to all of yours and the wolfs ticklish spots. With a muffled apology you begging to tickle the wolf feet in Ernest. He starts struggling and on the screen you see a percentage appear and slowly rise. But it's rising too slowly and you need to kick it up a notch. With another muffled apology you get out your claws and start tickling under and between his toes. He goes completely wild, bucking and shaking, the percentage is rising at a steady pace.

You reach 30% but you only have a minuet to go. A sudden brushing feeling on your feet caused you to jump as you look down to see the device had taken you over a line of rotating brushes meant to distract you. But it did the opposite for as you laughed and bucked it helped you to tickle the wolf harder. Once you finally passed over the brushes you noticed through watery eyes that it was 99% full with 30 seconds left. A few more strokes to his feet and you heard a 'clink'.

The key landed in a small trey next to your bound hands. You stopped tickling a picked it up as fast as you could, you where almost at the chamber! With some difficulty you positioned the key in line with the key hole. Just before you could slot it in though, some more brushes came up and tickled your feet again causing you to jump...
113111.title: Tickle his feet

1131111.content:
"Oh no" you think as you watch key fall in almost slow motion. The tickling on your feet had stopped but you knew that that was only going to be for a few more seconds. The screen mocked you with what a shame you where so close before moving up and out of the way of the brushes that where turning already. Being clad in just you underwear you started feeling very venerable.

As you entered the chamber the tickling began. All of your ticklish spots where attacked at once. Your armpits, ribs, sides, tummy, legs, knees and feet where all tickled into oblivion. As the doors to the chamber you felt brushes on them begin to tickle your back and the behind of your knees. "Mphahahahaha!" You screamed. Some brushes popped out by your fingers and for a bit you thought they where going to tickle your hands but then you realised they where to tickle the wolfs feet who was just as exposed as you and receiving a similar treatment.

After an hour was finally up the tickling stopped. You where moved out of the chamber and dropped to the flaw along with the wolf. With his mouth now free he simply said "you idiot" before passing out with you following soon after.

When you woke up you found the wolf sitting next to you. In his hand was a note. Sitting up you asked him what it said. "Oh hello your finally up. The note says this-well you failed miserably at that game, if you continue like this you'll never escape. But never mind here's your next game; down in the crematory lies Derek's girlfriend. She if undergoing some tickling of herself and it will really kick off of you don't make it too her in an hour. Here's a little clue: she LAYS in a place with ETERNAL DARKNESS but with NO SPACE to move in." Once your ready go through the door your time will begin. This is a team effort by the way-. Now I was going to leave you seeing as you tickled my feet and dropped the key but it looks like I need you to save my girl friend. Neither of us has a choice as it looks like we need to win these games to escape. Come on." Then, without offering you a hand he stands up and walks over to the door. You get up and meet him there.

When step through the door you gasp: the next room is completely different. There is a very realistic graveyard. The was mist, graves, moss and even a sky! (Although if you looked very carefully you could make out a roof) you stepped forwards and the warm, hard stone floor of the first room turned into damp squishy mud under your paws. To your right was a stand holding two feathers shaped as long swords. The wolf walked over and picked one up. With a sly grin he turned to you and used it to tickle your belly. You giggle and back away. "Now we're even" he says still grinning. You relax a bit as it looks like he's forgiven you. "But I wonder what these are for" he continues. You look around and see a note attached to the stand you pick it up and read it out loud "use these feather swords to fend off the living dead, who are as ticklish as you are."

No sooner had you finished the note 7 hands burst from the ground and out climbed 7 zombies. They began to zombie walk towards you however instead of moaning "brains" and reaching out to rip you apart they where moaning "tickle" and making tickling motions with their out stretched hands making their intentions quite obvious. Quick as a flash you grabbed your 'sword' and along with Derek you began to tickle the zombies. You tickled the one closets to your right who giggled before tuning to dust. Within no time you had both defeated the zombies. "Well that was fun but we better get moving now. My girlfriend Lucy is in trouble. She's obviously trapped in a coffin in one of those mausoleums." He said pointing to 3 of them. You where quite impressed at how quickly he solved the small riddle as you had only just come to the answer 5 seconds ago.

As you both ran towards to the structures you where constantly attacked by zombies and now all battles where as easy to win as the first. At one point a zombie hand shot out from the ground and grabbed your ankle causing you to fall face first into the mud then before you know it there was a zombie pile on whilst more hands came out of the ground to help hold you down and tickle you. The one that tripped you up took great joy in tickling your paws/feet (whatever you want to call them seeing as yours an anthro). You couldn't move your sword and thought you where doomed until Derek saved the day and tickled all the zombies into dust. Another time you where both overpowered and gang tickled by countless zombie hands. It was only by pure look that you landed next to Derek's sword and was able to fight them off enough to grab the other and for you both you to run away.

When you finally reached the mausoleums you where both panting, covered in mud and had wasted a lot of time. But you felt like you had bonded with Derek quite a bit and thought you could now call your selves friends. "Right then it will be one of these building, which do you think it is" looking up you see symbols above the doorways. On one of them was a zombie shape so you ruled that out quite quickly. But you couldn't decide which one was correct. There was a picture of a coffin which is what she was trapped in but the other had a symbol of a female who ,according to Derek, looked eerily like his girlfriend Lucy. Which do you choose?

choices: Down the long hallway like a disused factory.
Other direction.(Or refuse to help him, after all,could be dangerous...)
113112.content:
All the hapless wolf tied to something on the cieling can do is grunt, thanks to the muzzle around his snout. You get the message from his frantic squirming, though, and call up "Hold on! I'm gonna get you down." He's too high up to start untying right away, though he's been forced into wearing an odd boot-contraption that holds his feet together and taunt, with the toes pulled back and restrained individually by silvery metal. They're dangling just within reach of your fingers, but you dismiss the idea of tickling him and start looking for a way to scale the nearby wall. You find an ample supply of convienient handholds in the rather grimy wall, and you nimbly scale them with your freshly obtained claws. You reach his height, and see that he's actually sitting in something like a chair/harness, suspended from a hook built into the vaulted cieling. There's even a broad rim around it at the seat-like part that you should be able to stand on while you untie him. You glance at the hook, checking to make sure its secure, then coil and spring.          You agilely land on the device, barely shaking it, and look for the best place to commence sawing at the ropes with your sharp little fingers. Something on the back of his shirt catches your eye, though, and you snatch it off with one hand, hanging on with the other. Confused, you read it aloud. " 'So, you're the merciful type, eh? FYI, all of his binding are made of firm steel, and should be quite hard to remove. A single, special key in a compartment beneathe his seat will instently loose all of them simultaneously when inserted into the compound lock behind his neck. IT, however, can only be opened by a certain pumping motion activatible solely by him, and can only be obtained by tickling him when you've locked your shins into the special restraints. Now, you had best hurry up, as the vault doors will close in approximatley one minute, and the machine's timer is set for an hour! Good luck in the game!' "
          "Game?/!" You repeat confused, but then lurch as the hook in the cieling starts moving backwards, along some kind of towline, and a pair of sliding metal doors located directly in line with you on the wall clang open. In the cubby space revealed inside, you can make out dozens of revolving brushes, strategically located to press in to the helpless wolve's immobile ticklish spots. Panicking, you start pulling frentically on the chains holding him, but notice that his over-arm tie is connected to a large, bizarre looking lock that all the chains seem to lead to. Rembering the note of whoever set this up, you look down and see a metal box bolted to the bottom, next to two cylindrical metal tubes leading off the platform at an angle. You sit down, thrust your feet through and close them, hearing a small 'click', then another from within the machine, and look at the box. You notice a thing resembling a pump leading from the harness throught the seat and into the box, and realize the note was right. Only he could open the compertment by moving a certain way.
         The horrible little closet space is getting closer-you can see two huge twirling brush heads aimed specially at where your own feet are secured-and mutter an apologie. The wolf is squirming desperately, trying to get out before you reach the 'vault'. You reach up and begin hurredly scratching your fingers on his underarms. His eyes go impossibly wide, he yips through the gag, and starts squirming with amazing energy. Seeing a meter attached ot the side of the box start to fill up and change colour, likely demonstrating how far there was to go until the box opened, you move your fingers to his bare ribs, kneading hard. His struggles only increase, and seeing out of the corner of your eye that the brushes are coming closer, you are far to desperate to stop. You lean forward and start nibling in one exposed arm, swinging your tail to brush it against his belly, anything to get him to squirm harder. The meter fills, and a smaller side pouch unfolds. You snap the curiously shaped tool out frantically, and insert it into the mechanism holding the both of you. You nearly drop it-as the brushes finally contact your feet and the overwhelming pulse of nerve-burning sensations causes you to shake uncontrollaby. You muster the concentration to give it a final twist as the doors start to swing closed, and gasp in releif when bothe they and the horrendous tickling feelings stop. Panting from releife, you wrench your feet free, saying; "Sorry, pal. It was the only way to get us out of here." He, also gasping for breath now that he's removed his muzzle, replies: "No problemo. C'mon, let's get out 'o here." You jerk in surprise, when the doors and machine start moving again, but it's merely backing out and lowereing you to the floor. When you stand to leave, you notice something-another note- on his chair seat. You read it and show it to him.

Dear Brian,
As you are likly aware, you and whoever was bold or unlucky enough to activate the last game were not the only ones,ah, invited to this facility. Sylvia's is among our other sbjects, and is currently being held not far from here in the building. The removal of this note activated a timer, which is portable and equipped with a clue, that will show when her own tortuous tickle will commence. You of all people should know how sensitive she is. May you be luckier (or equally lucky)on this game!
Sincerely, Jona Crammor

         Beside you, you hear the wolf, aparently named Brian, groan. "What kind of sick bugger are we dealing with?" He says softly, before turning towards you. "Sylvia's my girlfriend. She's insanely ticklish. Please, will you help me find her? And it might be easier to escape this torture chamber if we work together." He pulls a dmall device form its slot in the back of the seat. It looks kinda like a watch, with a six-digit neon number witch reads: 00:59:34 and decreasing. Presumably, you have just under an hour to find and free Sylvia, if you so choose. Below the numbers is a small panel, etched with the words 'Limitless darkness in a tiny space, the terror of claustrophobes and bane of taphophobes, and the last resting place of nearly all dead. What am I?'
"Sounds like a coffin or something." You exclaim, reading it. But where would there be a grave 'round here?
113112.title: What the heck is this?/! Some perversion of SAW?

113212.content:
You run pell-mell down the hallway, around corners, up ramps, and through rooms small and large. Some are clustered with furniture, from simple armchairs and futons to less innocent-looking body frames and stocks. Scattered along the thoroughfares are statues of dozens of different species, some recognizable, many not, locked in ticklish combat or just locked 'n tickled in stocks. Huge tapestries and pictures large and small decorate plainer, less ostentatious regions. Despite the apparent wealth invested in the décor and the various doors that could theoretically fit throngs, the entire place is strangely deserted.

A measure of panic at your ignorance in regards to your whereabouts coupled with the impressive stamina of your new body causes you to go on for some time, before stopping to rest at a large bay window. All of the other window's you had passed before were either too far off or small too difficult to properly look out of, causing you to unconsciously think that it was night time, despite the overall comfortably strong level of lighting.

Outside though, the sun is shining perfectly brightly, illuminating a long, idyllically sandy white beach that stretches to the horizon and which lies several hundred feet below your vantage point. The alcove seems to be set several floors up into a large grey wall, which is in turn part of the structure situated on the edge of a cliff, with the sea on one side and extensive deciduous forests on the other. As you turn away from the vista, once again wondering where the dickens you are, and what had happened to the bear you woke up with eariler, something catches your attention:
113212.title: Keep looking for a way out

You look down at your feet, they are big, blue with white claws, you look at Cassie's, they are pink with light pink claws. You wonder why Cassie asks that, she is half your size but proportionally your feet are the same. "What do you want with me" you ask, and she replies, "Why do you think, your feet are the best out of all the dragons I know, Then comes Wheezie, then Zak."

11412.content:
You regain consciousness sometime later and find you are in a different room, this time, with your stomach to the cold stone floor, and your arms stretched out in front of you, shackled to the floor. Your legs are bent at the knees and held in place with your soles facing upward in a strange contraption.

You begin to struggle and find that your toes are again completely immobilized, exposing your soft sensitive soles for whomever finds you this time. You yelp in surprise as soft bristles contact your sole, scraping across your entire foot, but coming to rest at the exact moment you ceased moving. You again try to see what happened, and find that the brush begins to move up and down your sole, joined by an exact double on your other sole. You twist and wriggle and cry as you attempt to hold in your laughter.

You realize that the contraption is the source of your torture this time and simply burst into deep laughter. With every second you laugh and every moment you squirm to avoid the evil brushes, you find that they dig deeper into your feet, brushing harder, causing electric shots of ticklishness to shoot through you.

Your vision blurs and your voice weakens as the brushes continue their deed, but slowing with every ounce of strength you lose.

You soon find that
11412.title: Mechanical Mercy?

114121.content:
Suddenly the torment eases up and you begin to catch your breath.

"Whew, I thought I was a goner for sure," you say to yourself.

As you breathe very heavily and try to get out a few remaining giggles, you spot three shadowy figures coming up in front of you.

"Hello Nurse!" says one of the figures. You then notice it is the Animaniacs. No wonder, who else could come up with such a crazy contraption?

Dot looks at you and says, "Awww, you're so cute and I just love your laugh. Hows about a little more fun?" Shen then reaches over and pushing a big pink button on the machine. Gears begin to grind and a huge mechanical arm comes out with a coiled, wiggling finger. "Gitchy Gitchy Goo," says the machine in a robotic voice.

The large finger begins up one of your ribcages and works it's way down the other. You wiggle and twist, but can not escape the tickles that find every sensitive rib.

Dot pushes another button and two electric drills appear from the machine. Attatached to each one is a big pink feather duster. They spin with full force and find the bottom of each foot.

"Why are you, heehee, hahaha, doing this to, mmmmmahhhahahaha meeeeeee?" you ask between fits of laughter.
114121.title: More mechanical mayhem

choices: They agree but don't let you go.
1141211.content:
"why, we're making a laugh track," said yakko. "No one laughs at our jokes anymore and we decided to do something about it. A anamaniac without a laugh is practically useless."

"Yes," said Dot, "So let's get started again. Push the record button Wacko."

"HOld on! Hold on!" You shout. "I have a little deal for you," you say trying to catch your breath.

"We're listening," said Dot.

"I know some much better laughers than me and if you let me go, I promise to bring them here and help you with your laugh track."

"Just who are these laughers?" asked Wacko.

"It's my math teacher, mrs. Ferguson, and the gifted and talented class. She teaches them in the afternoons. All I have to do is make a phone call to the school and tell them this is a historical mansion and they should take a field trip here. They'll jump right on it. I promise."

The anamaniacs scratch their heads and then:

11511112111112.content:
Gatomon quietly pads up beside you, casually seizing hold of Amy's big toes and pulling them back, while her tail sneaks in and starts to gently tease abound the broad pink soles. "Hey, I thought you said you wanted to see the Hall of Most Ticklish Beings! Trust me, there are people a lot more sensitive than her just waiting down there for us."

         With some reluctance, you give Amy's yielding sides one last squeeze, before following Gatomon down the hall. As you pass rows of living, sleeping trophies, something drags itself into your mental attention.
         "If they've been tickled all day, and then we come along and start going at them when they're trying to sleep, won't they be too tired in the morning for the next group too tickle them very well? It doesn't seem fair not to share things that are that ticklish."

         "Way ahead of you on that one, partner. They all have some kind of access to these doohickeys called Zandman Sleep-pods; make's a snooze ten times as restful and as efficient. The main reason we don't tickle the inmates there almost all of the time is for psychological purposes; turns out that the terminally insane often simply aren't as fun to tickle."

         "Ah. Well, at least my conscious will be clear for that."

         You both walk on for quite a while, and it occurs to you just how big the Mansion is, and how many inhabitants must be there at any one time. Gatomon pulls up before a set of ornate double doors; you snicker as you see that the doorframe is covered in chains of amusingly cartoonish tickling-themed hieroglyphics. Cursing mentally for forgetting about them, you try to run out of the bushes. The vine gagging you still has a grip though, and pulls you back hard. Falling onto a whole bed of vines, you try to get up immediately. The vines don't allow it, and quickly seize your wrists and ankles.

The slithering sound returns as vines approach from every angle. Since they've already sampled your ticklishness they can't wait to get more, and they know all your most ticklish spots. You are holding your breath with antication and fear.

A vine touches your side, causing you to jerk. It continues its journey up your side, then across your belly, as you giggle helplessly. Another vine at your knee causes you to jerk, then travels up your leg. Another climbs your ankle and approaches your toes, another slithers up to your elbow then down your arm. The vines keep coming until you are nearly covered in greenery. And then they start tickling.

All your most ticklish areas are tickled at once. Vines carress your feet, drawing random patterns and designs on your arches and heels, sliding in-between your toes, even tickling the top of your feet. Further up, vines that have wrapped around your knees squeeze and knead them. Some vines slide feather-like tips across your thighs.

And that's just your legs. There are several vines tickling your underarms, drawing lazy circles with their tips. Vines knead all of your ribs and their maddeningly soft touches are all over your belly. However they know from previous experience that your belly button is your sweet spot, and accordingly are tickling it relentlessly.

Your giggles turned to guffaws, or at least would've had the vines not gagged you. You struggle to get away, but in the end it's a pointless struggle. You sway your body left and right, you buck your hips, you even try shaking the vines loose. It all amounts to nothing, as if the vines are stuck to you.

Unable to escape the torturous tickles or even vent your reactions, you try to escape somewhere into your mind. It doesn't work though, as the constant and intense sensations coursing through your body keep breaking down the mental barriers you try to put up.

A door opens on the far side of the room and you hear a pair of voices coming down the path. The debate with yourself takes place immediately.

You could vent all your remaining energy into making a sound hopefully loud enough to get their attention, but doing so would leave you helpless and at their mercy. And once they had you, who knew what they would do to you; probably something even worse than this.

On the other hand you could try to endure these vines until they let you go - if they let you go - and then resume your quest for an exit. But there is always the chance you would pass out before the vines stopped - and that is if they stopped at all. You're off the path, so no one will simply stumble across you.

Your choice. Do you make a noise and risk whatever punishment they have for you? Or do you try to outlast the vines?

1211122221211.content:
It’s all too much. You can barely catch your breath and your head is swimming. You dangle limply as the vines continue to assault your body, the last shreds of your pants being moved out of the way leaving you completely vulnerable in a pair of boxers.

Satisfied with your compliance the vines stop tickling and start to move you, passing you along, out the room and deeper into the green house. You can soon hear laughter and through blurry eyes you make out at least 6 people hanging from vines. A mix of men and women, stripped to their underwear and all being tickled mercilessly by the same vines that hold of you. One guy looks particularly exhausted, his skin is slightly red from all the tickling and he can barely twitch he’s that tired. However, upon seeing you his eyes light up! The vines stop tickling him and gently lower him to the ground. He passes out instantly but that’s not what worries you. What worries you is how the vines start pulling you up to were he just was. You’re his replacement...

Fortunately, your ordeal doesn’t start just yet. A vine with a flower on the end comes up and forces its way into your mouth. Your panicked struggling stops when you taste sweet nectar flowing from it, soothing your horse throat and refreshing you. Unfortunately, as well as providing hydration and nutrients, the nectar has another effect. Your whole body starts to warm up and tingle. Your hairs stand on end and you become a lot more aware of the light breeze. The flower retreats and a single stroke of a vine along your sole causes you to yelp and jerk violently. Seems the nectar has made your skin hypersensitive!

The break is over and now the vines get to work. Suspended as you are, nowhere is safe! Tips of vines dance along your feet, smaller feelers worming between your toes. Leafs on vines stroke behind your knees as well as up and down your thighs. You try to squeeze your legs shut but sadly the vines restraining you are much stronger. Some flowered vines use their petals to tickle your stomach and sides. The stomas of the centre one are also able to dip in and tickle your navel. More
vines dance alone your ribs, flick your nipples and play with your arm hair. It is hell. You’re struggles are in vain and leave you a sweaty, dribbling mess. In fact the sweat even allows slicker movement of the vines across your skin. There is nothing you can do but add your manic laughter to the collective laughter of the other captives.

Every now and again you get a break to rest and to be fed the nectar to sustain you. During one break you notice the guy you replaced wake up. Fearing recapture he drags his aching body away as fast as he can and the vines leave him to it. They’ve got you now after all.

You also have a lot of time to think when not having your thoughts obliterated by tickling. Above you are giant leaves and so you theorise that the plants may be after the CO2 from your breath. You once read that people talk to plants believing that their breath helps them grow better. Perhaps this is why they’re tickling you and making you laugh? It doesn’t help with escaping but it helps keep you sane. The vines can tickle you in so manny different ways there’s no adapting. It’s taking everything you’ve got not to lose your mind.

All you can do is wait until it’s your turn to be released or rescued. There’s still 5 people ahead of you though so you really hope it’s the rescue option. Otherwise you’re gonna be here for a very long time...
1211122221211.title: give in to your fate

1211122221212.content:
At exactly what happened after that, you don't really remember. You remember shouting something hardly intelligible a the top of your overworked larynx, some kind of pointless beg. Yelling at some length, until it devolved into a kind of gibberish mumble that was all that remained to stand between you and despair, your mantra against insanity. Exactly how long you remained incoherent, on the verge of mercifully passing out but for some reason never quite being able to do it, there was no way of telling. Eventually though, something broke through the daze, in which all thought and sensation had been subsumed and superseded by the relentless tickling, something changed. You weren't conscious in the common application of the word to appreciate it, but the vines, King, Queen, and all their entourage, left off their tickling and gently set you down back on the bed. Someone -several someones- came in and looked over you, talking amongst themselves before dragging you out. Exhausted out of your mind, sweating and tingling all over, you had fallen asleep too quickly to take any notice.

         And now you awake, still missing your shirt and footwear, but feeling alert, clean, and wonderfully refreshed. As you alertly sit up, you notice that the comfortable surface you had been left to lie on is a short padded couch, off to one side of a brightly lit, if small, oblong living room. A door sits promisingly to your left, while to the right the well furnished area gives way to a plainer kitchenette and table, the transition between the two marked by yet another hard wood door, and which in turn opens out onto a large deck via open sliding glass doors. A cool sea breeze blows in, and you stand up fully, wondering what had happened and where you are now.

She ignores your constant begging and climbs up on to the bed. She straddles your midsection and waves her furry fingers just above the hollows of your underarms. "Let's start here, my favorite spot!" she says, and immediately starts digging her fingers in to your armpits.
