1211222112221211.title: You fall unconscious, and wake up in an arena

12112221122212111.content: The girl is strikingly beautiful. She is in her underwear, exposing her sexy tan body, and deep navel, as well as smooth legs, armpits, and every other ticklish part of her body. Her eyes are sky blue, and her hair is about shoulder length, and blonde. You notice that you are also in your underwear, exposing your stomach, and ticklish areas as well. Suddenly she wakes up, and the two of you stare at each other for a couple seconds, before a voice comes from a speaker in the arena. "Ahem. Test. Test. Ah yes" You recognize the voice of Samm, and you can tell that the girl does too by the way she shudders and her eyes go wide. Samm continues, "The two of you have been our... um... experiments for the last few hours, and now it is time for one of you to go home." You and the girl lock eyes, then stare back at the intercom. "It is time for an all out tickle fight! Everything goes, but don't inflict any physical pain! Whoever gives up first loses. You may begin!" A buzzer sounds, and suddenly the girl leaps on top of you. "Sorry." she says, revealing a sexy British accent, "But I am way too ticklish" The girl begins tickling all over your armpits. "HAHAHAHAHAHAH STOP STAHAHAHAP" You manage to escape her grip and hold her hands above her head, and with your other hand, you begin poking her all over her belly. "HAHAHAHA NO FAHAHAHAIR" She shouts. You ignore her cries and stick your finger in her navel and wiggle it around. "WOAHOHOHOHOHO NAHAHAHHAHA NOHOHOHO HEHEHEHY" She cries. "NOHOHOHO MOHOHOHOHORE NOHOHOHOH" she pleads. You keep tickling and ask her, "Do you give up?" tickling harder. She laughs harder, "NEHEHEHEHVEHEHEHRRR" She somehow gains enough strength to go back on top of you, but this time, both of your hands are on the others. You laugh in unison, "HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAH" She manages enough of her voice to talk to you, "GIHIHIHIHVE UHUHUHUHUHUHP ALREHEHEHEHADYYY" You shout back, "YOUHOHOHO FIRHIRIRST" The tickling becomes intense. You tickle her all over her stomach, then her hips. She also goes to your hips, then your knees, but you stop that by sticking your finger in her navel. "HAAHAHHAHAHAHAHA" she cries. She shoots back up, and the two of you remain locked together, both tickling each other. It seems like this may go on forever
12112221122212111.title: Girl

121122211222121111.content: Suddenly, a plan pops into your head. You move up to tickle the girl's armpits and whisper into her ear so that no one else can hear, "I will let you win, but we will have to escape together" she continues laughing at your tickle assault, "WHAHAHAHAYY SHOULD I TURHUHUHUST YOHOHOU?!?" she cries. You tickle her harder, indicating that she has no other choice, and she finally nods her head in agreement. You pretend to fall backwards, and the girl falls on top of you and grabs your legs. She tickles between your toes and all over the arches of your foot, and after a few minutes, you finally announce your surrender. "I GIHIHIHIHVE UHUHUUP" you yell, although you're pretty sure you could've taken more than that. The girl stops tickling, and you manage to wink at her just before Samm and Don Turtelli enter through a large set of double doors. You point your fingers in an, "X" and by some miracle the girl understands that the two of you must tickle Samm and Don. Don smugly raises his hands in amusement, "Bravo, Bravo kids!" At this point, the girl pounces on him, tickling his raised arms before he could even think about it. Caught by surprise, Samm gets a head start on you before you can attack, and she sticks her sharp fingernail into your navel. "OHOHOHO CRAHAHAHAP" you laugh. You don't want to let the girl that you befriended down, so you muster enough strength to flip on top of Samm, and start squeezing her sides. "STAHAHAP YOHOHOU LIHIHITTLE RAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHSCAL" You find a little weak spot on her ribs, and you begin to scribble your nail into that spot. She squeals and cackles loudly, tears streaming down her face. "NOHOHOHOH PLEHEHEHEHAHAHASEE NOHOHOHOT THEHEHEHEHRE ANYWHERE BUT THEHEHEHEHRE" she begs. In your tickling trance, you realize that you never noticed the girl sprinting towards the open doors of the arena. She calls you over, but you notice Don Turtelli slowly recovering and moving over ready to grab you. In your moment of forgetfulness, Samm grabs your sides and squeezes them with her hands, while simultaneously sticking her finger deep into your navel. Your eyes go wide, and Samm flips on top of your her hyper fast fingers gliding across your stomach, raspberries being blown into your navel. It feels as if she is tickling every inch of your belly. "AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA I'M SOHOHOHOHORRY JUHUHUHUST LET ME GOHOHOHOHOHO" you plead. Samm only increases the tickling, as Don pulls out an electric toothbrush, gliding it across the bottom of your belly to your hips. He even uses his other hand to tickle your feet and toes. "WOAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA OH MY GOHOHOHOHOHOHOD" The experience is unlike any tickling you've ever experienced. You buck and try to shake them off, but in their enraged state, they don't seem prepared to budge. The girl sighs and sprints over to you, she rips two electric toothbrushes from Samm and Don Turtelli's back pockets, and proceeds to tickle their feet. The two howl and jump up. You manage to slide away, bolting for the doors with your new ally. As you race through the halls of the mansion, you reach an dead end with the only option to choose doors to your left or right. The girl looks extremely distraught, turning from door to door. She turns to you, "Look- I'm really bad at making decisions, especially in a place with as many tickling twists and turns as this one- you decide for us." she says. You scratch your head, as Samm and Don race up not too far behind you. "I'm gonna tickle the hell out of you twerps!" Samm shouts. You think for as long as you can and finally shout...
121122211222121111.title: Let her win

choices: Put on the oxygen mask, and prepare to carry Ashely outside
Give it to her and trust her to take you to safety
1211222112221211112.content: You and the girl barge into the door to the right of you, slamming it shut. Luckily, the girl notices a lock, and twists it abruptly, just as Don and Samm can be heard pounding on the door. "Phew!" she giggles and sticks out her hand for you to shake it. "I'm Ashely" she tells you. You smile back at her, shaking her hand "Nice to meet you Ashely, I'm [insert your name here]" you reply. The happy moment is interrupted, as the two of you suddenly realize the strange decorum of the room you're in. It seems to be some kind of tickling obstacle course. You take a step forward, ready to show off your bravery to the girl. "Well, I say we get started" you say, puffing your chest. Ashely snorts, poking you in the belly. You step backwards, giggling in the process. Ashely waves her hand, signaling for you to move back. She squints, staring at the obstacle course. "This... this isn't real." she says, astonished. You raise your eyebrow in confusion. "Pardon?" you ask. She turns to you, and you again notice her staggeringly beautiful blue eyes. "It's a hologram" she explains. Stepping closer to the figure, you wave your hand through the course, and sure enough Ashely's assumptions had been correct- your hand goes straight through a holographic mechanical hand. "But why would they-" your question is interrupted by the sound of Samm and Don trying to break down the door. Ashely stares at you with fright, "No time!" she exclaims, grabbing your hand and sprinting through the hologram. As you race through the large but fake obstacle course, you begin to realize why they would create the hologram. Obviously knowing that someone would try to run through it, the owners of this mansion set up booby traps, triggered by movement, and a countdown appeared on the wall, reading, "knock out gas will begin seeping into the air once you step outside, so please go back into the mansion." As you reach the end of the room, the two of you notice a door. most likely to the outside. There is also a table with a note and an oxygen mask. The note reads, "A gift from a fellow tickle victim. Sorry, there's only one." You look up at Ashely while holding the oxygen mask, wondering which of you should put on the mask. Ashely breaks the silence, "You decide who gets it. Either way, we're in this together, right?" You kiss her passionately on the lips. "Right." you whisper into her ear.
1211222112221211112.title: "Right Door!"

choices: You wake up next to Ashely in the red goo room with tickle spiders again
You wake up with Ashely in a tricky situation outside the mansion
12112221122212111122.content: You hand her the oxygen mask. "Ashely, if we're caught, drop me and run. I'll take whatever they have planned" Ashely nods, and this time she kisses you on the lips. She attaches the mask to her mouth, and the two of you barge outside. The sound of gas seeps into the air. This knock out gas, is of course contaminated, as you feel intense tickling on every inch of your body. They probably made it so that you would be tickled to unconsciousness. You feel the world begin to fade to black, tears streaming down your eyes. "GOHOHOHOOOD LUHHUHUHUCK ASHELY" you manage to choke out as you fall to the ground.
12112221122212111122.title: Give it to her and trust her to take you to safety

1211222112222.content:
Samm reaches her fingers forward and once again has them tracing circles around your underarms. She seems to be in pure bliss, while you're in pure hell. The slow, almost lazy circles she drags around the hollows of your armpits drive you over the edge. You arch your back, twist left and right, you even try bucking her off. Nothing works though, and the longer she tickles you, the weaker you get. Finally, too exhausted to do anything, you resign to the torment your underarms are receiving.

Until Samm takes it to a whole new level.

"Ooooh," she says. "Ticklish on our belly too, are we?" To your utter disbelief and dismay, you feel something tracing your belly and sliding in and out of your navel. It takes you a moment to realize that she's using her tail. Her tail! The soft and furry tip was drawing maddening circles around your stomach and sides. "Oh you are SO much fun to play with! I might just tickle you all day like Turtelli said I should, and it's not even noon!"

Did you just hear right? All day with this tickle-freak? And it's not even noon? You have to get out of there, though at the moment you appear to be a little... preoccupied. "HAHAHAHAHA WHA-WHAHAHAHAT DID IHAHAHAHA DOHAHAHAHAHAHA!?!" you try to ask, but you wonder if Samm even understood.

Maybe she did, because she relented just enough so you could understand her when she leaned down next to your ear and whispered "I don't know, to be honest. But I don't care, because now that you're here I'm never going to let you leave this mansion. On top of what the Don has prepared for you, you're going to be my little plaything whenever you get a break. Get used to it." With that she laughed, and tripled the intensity of her tickling.

As you break into peals of silent laughter, you can't help but be angry at the unfairness of it all. Without explanation you are thrown into this mansion, get tickled to death by some spiders in some goo, and now are subjugated to even more tickle torment for no better reason than because your captors wanted this. If there was any chance of escape - ANY chance, you would jump at the opportunity.

Then Samm began to really dig her fingers into your underarms, and coherent thought becomes impossible.

Just as you are on the verge of passing out, Samm stops entirely. She stands up and watches you pant, trying to get air back into your lungs. When you look up at her, she grins and says "can't have you wear out too early. I'll be back soon, so don't worry. Ta-ta!" And with that and a flick of her yellow and black tail she leaves the room, closing the deadbolt behind her.

This would be a perfect opportunity to try to escape, you decide. No one else in the room means that if you get free you'll have the jump on whoever next comes in. However, even if you escape there's no guarantee that you won't just end up in a trap or another tickling room like the one with the goo. Anyway you're exhausted, and you won't be able to take on anyone in your current state.

What do you do?
1211222112222.title: Way Too Slow

12112221122221.content:
You struggle for a few minutes, urgently trying to loosen one of the cuffs. Luckily for you one of the metal links holding you right hand back is old and rusty, which eventually gives way to your efforts. With one had free, you quickly unfasten the cuffs binding your left wrist and ankles.

You tiptoe up to the door and try it out, and - to your surprise - opens. You are immediately suspicious, as you are certain you heard the deadbolt slide into place locking you in. Regardless this is your one chance to get out, so you run out into the corridor and immediately dash. If anyone was there they weren't trying to stop you, and you made it all the way to the end.

Faced with another unlocked door, you burst through and are met immediately by something you never expected.

A jungle.
12112221122221.title: Out Of The Frying Pan...

121122211222211.content:
Even though you are fazed by the sudden change of scenery you push forward, still wearing nothing but your underwear. Since everything looks natural you assume that this is a garden of some kind, and in a place like this you wouldn't be surprised if some garden gnome jumps out of nowhere and tickles you to death.

What happens next is essentially the same thing, without the garden gnome.

You trip over on an uplifted root, face planting into the undergrowth. You lie there a moment, then start to flip over.. and are immediately seized by several snaking vines that just came from the foliage. You struggle desperately, but find that you are completely unable to move. Dozens of vines of varying sizes are holding you off the ground, but they are doing so in a way that covers no part of your body. Held horizontal just above the ground, your ears pick up more rustling.

Hundreds of vines extend from everywhere; the trees, the plants, the earth, all poised and writhing above your body. The movement reminds you of snakes, as all the surging and coursing appears like slithering. You now desperately wish that you had slept as a whole forest of vines extends towards your...
121122211222211.title: ...And Into The Fire

1211222112222111.content:
Dozens of vines reach for your upper body, most of them ending in feathery tips. The slithering sounds become even louder as the large green mass approaches inch by inch towards your defenseless form. You try to struggle but the plant is so strong you may as well be paralyzed. The vines come forward and rests on all your most ticklish spots on your upper body. You giggle and tense, waiting for when the torment begins.

You don't wait long. One at a time the vines come to life; gently stroking your belly, sliding up and down your underarms, moving along each rib, lightly itch your sides with the feather tips. At first it only causes you to giggle, but as more and more vines begin to move the more harsh the giggles became. Soon you were giggling uncontrollably, but the plant didn't stop there. Slowly but surely the tickling became more intense; stroking became tracing, sliding became light digging. As the intensity increased, so did your pitch. By now you were laughing like a maniac, occasionally breaking into silent fits and peals of laughter.

But the plant didn't stop there. As if tickling your upper body wasn't enough, the rest of the vines descended on your legs and feet. The tickling extended down to your hips, thighs, knees, and of course your feet, which were tormented in countless ways. Your eyes, already wet, were now spouting tears like waterfalls. Your laughter grew hoarse and your shut eyes squeezed tighter as you tried to escape from the torture, but all your brain could make sense of was the endless tickling that covered your entire body.

Almost lost in the sensations, he now noticed a new one. It felt like some of the vines were smearing a thick and sticky liquid to most of his body. With all the other tickling sensations this one only added to the torture, but you fail to acknowledge it as anything more than a new tickle technique. Boy do you have a surprise coming.

Just as you are about to pass out, the tickling eases up a little but doesn't stop. You're at the end of you rope, but the plant let's up just enough to keep you awake. It takes a long time - especially since the tickling didn't stop - but you eventually regain a little bit of strength. Your laughter can actually be heard now, and your eyes aren't as scrunched up any more.

However instead of increasing the tickling back to an unbearable amount like you expected, the tickling gradually stopped. It took over fifteen minutes and you kept laughing for a good extra minute since they stopped, but it eventually stopped. You contemplated the idea that the plant may have mercy, but you were still suspended in the air. Not having the faintest clue, you begin to worry. Had someone from the mansion heard you? Surely they must have. Or were you lucky enough that they hadn't heard and you still had a bit of time before someone spotted you.

All these thoughts are flying through your head so quickly that you don't at first notice when something feels wrong. You don't know exactly why, and it takes a while for you to find the source of your discomfort. There is a new sound in the forest, a constant buzzing that is slowly but gradually growing louder. You try to turn in the direction of the noise but find that you are still paralyzed, and so just turn your eyes instead.

What you see is an enormous swarm of bugs. The bugs don't look like anything anyone's ever encountered before, and they come in varying shapes and sizes. Frowning, you wonder why they are heading towards you. Then it hits you and you realize.

The sticky stuff before that the vines smeared on your body must be attracting them somehow. Your body was so numb from the tickling that you didn't feel it too well, and you'd completely forgotten about it. Then your spirits crash. The only thing that could motivate such a large amount of insects to go to a certain place so quickly is food, and lots of it. Since the only thing different about you is the liquid, you assume that is the food.

And the vines slathered your entire body in it.
1211222112222111.title: Plant Life These Days

choices: Someone comes and shoos away the bugs
12112221122221111.content:
Still immobile, you try frantically to gain a bit of room to maneuver. No such luck. Your efforts grow more frantic as you wearily eye the approaching swarm. All different shapes and sizes, who knows what kind of torturous tickling could those bugs do?

The buzzing is now deafening and you try to cover your ears (once again remembering he couldn't move). You give up entirely, just waiting for the inevitable torture staring at you in the face. Your heart pounds like a drum, your mind is everywhere and nowhere all at once. The swarm is fast approaching...

And now it's here.

You immediately break out laughing. With all the different shapes and sizes, the bugs remind you of those in the goo pool you saw earlier. The little bugs start their work, sliding in and out of your belly button and nibbling at the walls of it. More bugs snacking away into your underarms, while others eat what's on your feet and in-between your toes. The torment is intensified again because you are completely unable to move and thus do anything to alleviate the torture, only seconds after starting you once again break into fits of silent laughter and feel your tears run like streams from your eyes.

The tickling is too unbearable, yet you do not fade or pass out. There is no escape from the tickling, and the longer you're tickled the more resigned you become. The hours stretch on, the sun sets, the moon rises, and the bugs still show no sign of even getting close to being finished soon. You cannot think about anything but at incessant tickling that stops you from even trying to escape.

And so the night dimmed and the sun rose again, and you spent the entire night laughing like a maniac. You're becoming fatigued, but the tickling doesn't let you sleep. Fortunately the swarm seems to have thinned, but the remaining bugs show no sign of halting or even letting up. If anything the remainders intensified the torture you truly believed impossible. Your voice is hoarse, you are weak, and the tickling shows no sign of slowing.
12112221122221111.title: Swarm

choices: They take you to HQ and interrogate you further.
Something else(You are invited to join them, or try to sneak back in the Mansoin
121122211222211111.content:
The tornment stretches on endlessly, and its only the fact that the majority of the bugs seem to have eaten all they can get at and have moved. Only the smaller, more persistent ones are relentless, and you continue to produce unending laughter from your aching lungs. Your throat is sore too, and you ache all over from your constant, futile attempts at freedom. "Down fellas, down." Somebody shouts bellow you, and you open bleary, partially bloodshot eyes to see who it is. A huge tigress wiht an enormous mane of flaming red hair, holding an incense burner, is standing under you. The bugs reluctantly shoe away from the thick smell, and you start catching your breath. Your strength and sanity will need to be recaptured later. For reasons unknown, the vines relax, and you desperately tear your way free to land at the towering cat's huge foot-paws. "Th-Thanks," You pant, rising in to a push-up position as you struggle to get up. Instead, she reaches down and easily hoists you up with one paw. "Well, well, well. What have we here? Another Mansion escapee?" You start to knod, but then her voice hardens. "Or a spy?" You frantically shake your head 'no', conscious of the massive piower in the single hand on your neck. "That prisoner is mine. Give him up, and we may let you go without some punitive measures. Well, none too severe..." The tigress drops you on the ground behind her, hand going to something in the belt holding up her loincloth. Across the clearing, Samm casually leans against a tree, nearly a dozen armed anthro cronies fanning out behind her. She points something- it looks threateningly like a gun-at the both of you. "Come now hand him over. And, well we're here... Drop whatever weapons you might be carrying and walk over to that tree over there."
         "Now now, be reasonable... " Weedles the huge anthro standing over you, making no sudden or threating moves. One of her big arms makes expansive placating gestures, while the other still works its' way deep into her belt pouch.
          "Of course I'll give you this human-he is Mansion property after all. Its just how I'm gonna do it-Over my dead body!" She roars, leaping and rolling sideways with amazing agility, while reflexively Samm pulls the trigger on her gun and a ball of crackling yellow energy blasts out. It narrowly misses you, hitting a tree, though oddly there's no evidence of anything having struck it. The tigress finishes her manuevre at the closest unlucky furry, a bobcat, and swings her around with one hand, wrenching her in front by yanking on her gun arm. She clamps down on her victim's smaller paw, and the gun fires a bolt of it's own. Another anthro was charging directly at them, and is hit head on by the missile. She falls to the ground, looking like she's having a seizure. You then notice her face contortted with silent laughter, already tearing up while she shakes on the ground, clutching at her body. You begin to understand what the guns do. A rope net flies overhead, followed by several darts, and you see another goup of anthros-a leapord, a lioness, and a panther- charging in from the brush on the other side of the open space. All are wearing the simple cloth tube- tops and loincloths as the tigress, decorated with numerous beads and small talismans. The leapord spins behind a tree, fitting another net-bolt into her crossbow. As the panther leaped upon another of Samm's affliated anthros, already woozy from a lightly poisoned dart, and the lioness is dropped by some more fire, you come to your senses and scramble for a discarded gun. A body falls past you- the vixen attacked by the tigress, who's now dodging more enemy fire while returning it with what looks like a pistol-sized crossbow with a lot of gears and levers built in. The fox pulls out a smaller pistol from her tight security guard suit, aiming at at the back of the panther gaining the upper hand of her own engagement. You tackle her just in time, and wrest away the gun. She snatches at it, but you fire point blank. She bursts out laughing, shaking form side-to-side, and you decide she's incapicated. "Fall back!" Yells Samm, firing frantically at the elusive tigress and backing away.
         One of her opponent's missiles, strikes the wolf next to her. It bursts open in a mass of green tendrils, several thick ones tightening around her abdomen while the others start trying to digg in. They seem too weak to do more than prod the lupine, but the frenetic poking and dragging had a strong affect as the unlucky wolf stumnles away into the forest, laughing uproarisly and almost loosing her gun while attempting to get the seedling off her belly. Samm fired off a few more shots, turns and dashes away, the other anthros in security guard suits not engaged or downed sprinting after. T
         he tigress holstered her hand-held cross bow, strode over and started draging the zebra entangled in the heavy net towards the center of the clearing. Still giggling-a bizarre sight, given her wild appearence- the lioness reagined her feet, noddding at the panther, who was dragging a half-conscious hare. She growled at the Mansion guard struck early in the skuffle, and the furry bolted for the safety of the trees. "Well, two captured and the rest routed. Another victory." Remarked the tigress, staring in the direction Samm had taken. "And one prisoner receovered, Alkaiah." Pointed out the panther. "Right, Pyrogomache !" You are pulled forward. 'Did you escape the Mansion, boy. Speak fast, we have reason to be warry of spies, and don't take kindly to them." You rapidly summarise waking in the mansion, freeing yourself, being caught and tortured, escaping again-only to be aprehended by the fauna itself and tickled to the brink of insanity, and then meeting this group. The leapord nodds as you finish your tale. "I think he's telling the truth. I have met this Turtelli. He's is completely merciless, and is, to my regret, skilled. I can only hope I shall meet him so again..." She unconsciously fingers her huge net-gun like crossbow. "Sisters, let's take him back to base. I still think this one might be a spy; there are very few with thte good fortune to mak ei ut of the Mansion. Ever." Declares the last of the group, the lioness. "I still don't trust him." "Agreed." Alkaiah reaches into her belt and oulls out a stripof febric, which she winds around your head at eye level. "You only need to wear this until we return to base. You may call us 'the Resistance', we help people who escape the Mansion, and occaisionally launch raids to rescue prisoners. Now, follow us."
121122211222211111.title: The resistance.

12112221122222.content:
The temptations of rest quickly lull you to sleep. As you fade into slumber you hear something loud, like a deadbolt sliding back...


You awake once again to find yourself strapped to a chair in a situation similar to your first experience in this creepy place. The restraints seem secure, but they did last time and you escaped. But no matter how hard you try, you cannot break free of the iron cuffs.

Eventually you just resign to the fact that you cannot escape and sit there waiting for someone to come in. Maybe you'll finally get some answers.
12112221122222.title: Again?

12112222.content:
Samm pushes you into the room and straps you to an x frame in the center of the room. The room itself is dark and apart from the frame, the faint squares on the walls, and a button near the door you can't see a thing. Samm finishes tying you in and leaves pressing the butting o her way out.

The door immediately slams shut behind her, and you hear a whirring noise as you feel the x frame tilt back into a horizontal position in the middle of the room. For a second nothing happens. You can hear your heart beating like a drum in your chest. The tension is thick in the room... And is cut suddenly by the lights coming on.

They're so bright that you have to close your eyes, and then you have to squint as your eyes adjust. You hear a mechanical voice state "all systems boot" as the squares on the walls open to reveal a forest of metal tentacles reaching into the room. You can see that many of the tentacles have different tips; some end in a tiny brush, others in silky strings, and some simply ended in a fine point. You could see hundreds of different tips, and thousands of each one.

You hear the mechanical voice again. "Prepare for sequence Omega."

All of a sudden everything stops. The tentacles are poised above your body and though you can't see them, there are probably some below you as well. Then four tentacles that end in blades reach for you neck and legs. You flinch, but pain was obviously not their intention as they proceed to tear up your clothes.

"Hey!" you shout. Despite being in a vulnerable position you can't help but protest to being stripped. After a few seconds the tentacles withdraw, thankfully leaving your underwear intact and whole.

"Sequence Omega, ten cycles, initiating process one."

The tentacles shift, and you shudder as a group reaches for...
12112222.title: The Machine

122.content: You feel light-headed as you look at your new hands- they are hands, right? How could this have happened? How did you turn into a
122.title: Digivolved?

1221.content:
It doesn't matter, now. You need to escape. You open the door easily and take a look into the hall. Unline the room, the hall is well-decorated. Several candelabras and pictures line the way. All the pictures are of feathers and all sorts of creatures being tickled. Wait, what kind of a place is this!?

"Not again...!" A whine comes from down the hall to your left. Maybe you should check it out.
1221.title: One small step for Veemon

12211.content:
You walk past a hunting trophy of an Agumon, but turn back when you hear a light sigh of relief. The Agumon looks like he just saw a ghost, and apparently he's still alive! Right below his head, both of his feet are on another plaque with soles facing towards you. His feet are shaking violently and trying to cover each other's broad sole.

"Please don't!" Pleads Agumon. "Haven't I been tickled enough?"

You think about letting him go, but his feet are wiggling right in front of your face.
12211.title: Off the wall

122111.content:
"Maybe later," you claim and reach out to the cowering feet. Each is both longer and wider than your hand and is curled violently. You turn your hand around and push the foot on your right up by the toes. The sole is struggling to escape, but you hold it up firmly with your palm. Agumon's breath quickens and his eyes are full of fear.

You reach your other hand over and brush it along the sole. Agumon flinches a bit and grits his teeth. His foot is warm and incredibly soft, although a little muscular. You curl your fingers down along the sweet arch and he nearly screams. He tries to push your hand away with his other foot and fails miserably. You swirl your new claws across his ball and down the far side to his heel.

"Nononono!!" Agumon's voice catches in his throat. You brush your nails down the inside of the arch and you can hear him stifle a cry.
122111.title: He asked for it?

1221111.content:
You grab the foot with both hands and bring your face all the way in. It smells faintly sweet, and Agumon takes the opportunity to slow his breathing. You stick out your tiny tongue and briefly drag your tongue along the arch, which makes Agumon shutter. You lick straight up to the middle toe and lick all along it with slow movements. Agumon squirms now and giggles. You stick your tongue between his toes and thrash it about, which elicits a belly laugh. You open your mouth wide and put it all around the ball of his foot and start licking all over his sole with fast, long licks. Each lick makes him jump until you finally stop.

"Hehehe... whew!" Agumon hangs his head and lets his breathing slow again. "Could you let me out of here, now?"
1221111.title: Get your licks in

12211111.content:
You grip the foot around the back with one hand and pres your thumb deep into his arch to massage it.

"Alright. You've been a good sport. How do I let you out of here?"

"Ahh... what did you say?" Agumon sighs in relief and finally relaxes his feet.

"I asked how I can get you out of here."

"You mean you're really gonna help me!?" You can feel Agumon perk up through his fleshy feet. "Arn't you one of them?"

"I just woke up in that room bolted to a chair."

"Well, once you find my body you can unscrew my head and feet and just stick them back on. Where my body is, I have no idea."

"I guess I'll see you again when I find it, then. See ya!" You dig one last time into his soles making him jump before continuing on down the hall.
12211111.title: Good deed for the day

122111111.content: You come to a turn in the hall. There is a snow-white Gatomon, sleeping in a very ornate set of stocks. The structure holds her legs level to the ground with her tiny paws sticking out a pair of holes. Her arms stick straight sideways and bend forwards at the elbows. It gives the appearence that she sunk down into a chair, but is obviously intended to open up more of her tiny tummy for tickling. Right now, she is sleeping happily.
122111111.title: What decorations!

choices: She did ask for it, right?
Ask her where to find Agumon's body
1221111111.content:
You give a quick tickle on her side and she smirks and stirs, but does not wake. You continue at the same pace and she lifts an eyelid.

"Already? Alright, lets get this over with," she whispers with a bit of a smile. She closes her eyes and relaxes.
1221111111.title: Sleeping beauty

12211111112.content:
"Actually, I want to ask you something."

"Shoot." She doesn't even bother opening an eye.

"There's an Agumon down this hall that wants his body back. Any idea where they keep it?"

"Beats me. Why do you want to help him, anyways. He screams like a girl everytime someone even touches him." Gatomon is chuckling to herself now.

"And you dont?"

"That's right. If you don't believe me, go ahead and see for yourself."

You shug and drag your claws along her side. She bends her body away from your hand and smirks with her eyes closed tight, but does not laugh. You brush her other side with your other hand and she jumps the other way. Her body bounces back and forth now, but she does not laugh. Your fingers work up to her armpits and she recoils. She is holding her breath now to keep from laughing. You pull your hands out and she lets her breath out.

"I told you. I can take it!" She has a look of triumph in her eyes, but is still panting. You drop to your knees so her tiny feet are in your face. They do not cringe like Agumon's did. The only movement you see is from her full body's panting. You blow on them lightly, and her toes curl momentarily. You pull your fingers and thumbs together along the pads and she pulls her feet back. You skittle your claws along her feet but they stay relatively taught. You grab one foot around the back and hold it still. A single claw slides between her toes and she immediately cracks. You repeat with the other two toes and she pulls back with all her strength, which does not amount to much. Now that she has cracked, a light brush along her sole keeps her going. Even as your hands creep up to her waist, she continues laughing heartily. You stop and grab her same foot from behind again.

"Alright...hoo...hoo...you got me good. I'll help you out. Just let me out of here."
12211111112.title: Being the nice guy that you are

122111111121.content:
"Alright." You stick the same claw between the same two toes. Gatomon grips the arm restraints and sniffs sharply. You turn an ornate knob on the side several times and her legs go free. A second knob around the back lets her arms go. She immediately jumps out.

"This way!" and she darts around the corner without a word of thanks.

So, you put a hand around each side of his neck and begin to turn it. Agumon closes his eyes tightly, as if waiting for an impact. His head goes upside-down, right side up, and doesn't come off the wall until its right side up again. He sighs in relief and you hand his head to Gatomon. Grabbing a foot, Agumon yips behind you.

"Quiet, you baby!" You lick between his toes to get it out of his system, yet he continues to wimper behind you. You finally unscrew the feet, and Gatomon as already taken off down the hall, apparently deep in conversation with Agumon (or his head, at least.)
