You felt unsure but the imagination of helping this helpless agumon push you forward in the sand. Your steps smoothed on the surface and your legs sink deep in it but you ever felt the ground. It was cold and rubs around your tights. And then, suddenly you felt something around your feet. It was a wet and you pulled your feet away a bit. You kept walking and this feeling comes again but you can't move anymore.

You felt something stroking your feet and your blue soles. You broke in laugh. Now, you know, that the agumon had said: Not "Gaps". He said "Traps!"
12211211.title: Sandy ticklish

122112111.content:
As you laugh at the top of your lungs, you then notice a big sign that reads "Sugar Moles, Beware."

You remember reading about these little creatures. They live beneath the sand and pull passers-by down and tickle thier feet with thier furry, skinny, fingers. There is only one way to get them to stop. They crave sugar.

Shaking with hysterical laughter, you reach into your pocket and pull out a:
122112111.title: sugar Moles

choices: Sprint over it and hope, they eat still the candy bar.
You can't avoid it and must took a other way.
1221121111.content:
You shook yourself hardly and the thing you grab was a candy bar but it fall down on the sand. One sandmole grabbed, broke it in pieces and gets under the sand again. Suddenly, the tickling stops and you took the change to run forward over the sand, avoid anything and get on the other side where a big door stand with the label: "Stock for Victim bodies."

You nods and took the door knob turn it and steps enter. You jumps back scared a bit. This was a giant hall and all walls around you are covered with bodies or body parts. Big chests, where the arms, head and feet missing where there, but also random head, laughing and screaming in laugh loudly. Also feet are in boxes but the matching body missed. You looks around and some heads looks at you, shouting for help. But you passed. All bodies are labeled and you searched the whole category with the beginning letter "A". Then, you smiled and sees the orange body hooked on the wall on the clothes it had on. You touched it and it squirm. You took it of the wall and runs outside again until you reached the sand again. You touched your pockets but now, you really hadn't any candy anymore. What should you do?
1221121111.title: Releasing victory!

choices: promise to help get out of here, quickly without any stop.
You let me tickle you a bit before i help you.
12211211111.content:
You only hoped, your feeling don't mistread you as you now took range and then jumps forward and runs over the sand, digging in it and sink slowly in. You moves forward and the other end get close. You seems to be right with your idea to try it because no sugar mole was holding at the moment. The Candy seems to have stilled their hunger. You smiles and felt happy, stepped with one foot out as you other food got caught suddenly. You stares back and throw the Agumons Body on the ground in fear, that it twitch hardly then. You saw the brown head and hands out of the sand holding around your foot, the paper of the candy still in the mouth, sucking on it but then, spit the paper away in the ground. "MORE SCHUGGA!" The Mole pulled you to toward his head and then licked over your foot with his of the chocolade sticking mouth and tongue. You laughed hardly but then kicked swiftly with the other legs at the head of the mole and he release you.

You took the body up nd reached now over the holes without great trouble and comes in sight of the Agumon at the wall again, who smiles and shines of happiness. "You got my body! And i thought, you forgot me again!" you smiles at him and laid the body down looks up at him and he smiles. "Now twist my feet and head around like you would want to unscrew them...." "Ok, but before, i want my reward. Before i will help you, you....."
12211211111.title: Too fast!

122112111112.content:
"Are going to let me tickle you a bit."

Agumon lets out an exasperated sigh and hangs his head. "I'll... *gulp* let you tickle me all you want after we get out of here. My head and feet will still unscrew for a little under a week after you put them back on."
122112111112.title: Making deals

1221121111121.content:
"Fair enough," You shrug and Agumon sighs in relief.

"Oh, thank you. I've been on this wall for months. Mind putting my head on first?"

"Sure. Just unscrew it, right?"

"That's all there is to it. Just make sure you spin it the right way."

"No problem," you mumble and reach for his neck. Agumon looks down and braces himself. You begin to twist, but nothing happens.

"Ow ow ow ow OWWWwwWWW!!" You let go, and Agumon pants. "Try it the other way"

"Alright, sorry" you stammer and try the other way. Nothing happens besides Agumon's whining.

"They installed a damn T-lock," he sighs.

"Lemme guess."

"That's right. It won't unscrew until until you... you know. I don't know how hard or for how long either. I tried to figure it out with the Gabumon that used to be across from me, but I really couldn't find any pattern. I guess you'll just have to... get it over with." Agumon cringes with the words, tenses his nerves, and lifts his soles to you.
1221121111121.title: Sensibility

12211211111212.content:
"Hold on, I think I have an idea."

"...really?" Agumon has a glimmer of hope twinkling in his eye.

Without any warning, you start screaming in his face. Agumon starts freaking out and stammering for a clue. To emphasize, you grab his head and start shaking it. After about a minute of this, you try to unscrew. Once again, it won't budge. You inexplicably stop screaming, leaving Agumon scared and confused.

"Apparently it doesn't work off your pulse" you say nonchalantly.

"You might as well have just tickled me" sighs Agumon, exhausted.

"Sorry."
12211211111212.title: SCREAMING

122112111112122.content:
"I might as well just get it over with. Does it take long?"

"They usually go for about 15 minutes. I don't know if it actually takes that long."

"Hmm. Do I actually have to screw your head off while tickling?"

"You have another window of around 15 minutes."

"Good." You eyeball his idle body. It's wearing blue track pants and a wifebeater. "Do I necessarily have to tickle your feet for it to work?"
122112111112122.title: Helping hands

choices: Head back adn start trying to free more prisoners.
Start exploring the entire place, looking for an escape rout.
1221121111121221.content:
He unconsciously wriggles his feet around, sighing again, though possibly more in exasperation than in fear of being tickled. "Yu' think? That's probably why they let my feet out. It's all some sort of sick game to them. Just get on wiht it." He closes his eyes, bracing yourself. Hesitantly, you begin tracing your fingertips all over his soles, dragging elliptical patterns. Heel, arch, ball. Heel, arch, ball. Repeat. They feel suprisingly soft and giving, despite his slightly saurian appearence, and you can see him fighting not to laugh. Starting to enjoy yourself despite his obvious discomfort, you press down harder with your fingers, and he starts laughing. "Ahahaha! Stohohop! Stohop! Its not worthhihith it hahaha!" Grinning, you start moving each of your fingers in independent scratching motions, while still moving them slowly up and down. His feet wobble and twitch around with surprising movement, and you grab hold of his three toes with one hand to remedy this. Holding the foot taunt and ready, you trace down a zigzag from the middle digit, and he seems to find this even more, hilarious than your previous work. Conveniently, you notice there are a pair of metal devices folded into the wall behind his feet, and pull one forward and affix his toes to it. With both hands free to work, you start scratching away really hard now, pressing in deeper. "Wahaiahait! Sthohohhohohop! Pleheeheas!" You ignore his frantic begging, instead discovering a sweet-spot where his arch joins his heel, and press hard into it with your thumb, holding in place with your other fingers. His frantic pleading reminds you that your technically doing this for more than your personal amusement, and you gently pull on his head. It doesn't give, so you string up his other foot and try the same mavuevre there.
         You hear a small 'click', and free one hand to pull on the trapped Argumons head. It gives, and you reluctantly stop torturing him. "Sorry, man. Ir needed to be done." You cheerfully remind him well taking his head out of the wall. He just glares at you, but is soon happily turning his head about wiht newfound frredom when you put it to his neck and it automatically re-ataches. You each take out a foot, and, after a few playful tickles, hand them to him.
1221121111121221.title: Absolutely

1221121112.content:
You feel the constant tickling at your feet and as you pulled out the single tic-tac you screams more in laugh, because of the helpless. But like something happened, a white head of a mole stuck out near your legs, hugging them and tickle them a bit. "Schuga, Schuga?"

You throw down the tic-tac in the hope, that would be enough to escape. The Mole head jumps after the tic-tac and taste it. He turns around and looks angry. "NO SCHUGA!" The head disappeared again and you break in laughing again but now, the moles tickle your feet and your toes terrible. You....
1221121112.title: Tic-Tac- toe-lick

choices: someting makes you fall so you can't get back up
122112112.content: You try to free yourself but then sink deeper until your legs are completly burried. Something comes up to your belly and tickles it you laugh wondering what that was and then...
122112112.title: Try to free yourself

12212.content:
Pondering whether or not you should of investigated the voice from the alternative hallway you continue onward. The light grew weaker and weaker as you traversed through the ominous path and you notice the small echoes of your footsteps. In the almost pitch black room you think to yourself, instead of wondering how you got here or how to illuminate the current room, you think of how to get out of this strange labyrinth. That about 20 step (regarding the size of your Veemon feet), there was a bright light casting through a door. When close to the door, quietly, you slowly in the door. A silhouette casting itself on the light almost made you fall back. In a small state of shock, you timidly look at the silhouette, it's a small cat figure. Before you can examine the sight any further, it disappears. You try again to peek into the room, you are surprised to be what you are witnessing.

You see Gargomon bounded and gagged to the floor laying on his back. His handguns and holster were plied in the corner, leaving him only wearing pants. He was heavily panting and sweating, due to his condition he has yet to notice you. His feet were curling and extending in a randomly repeating cycle. You don't see the cat person present in the room, so you infer that the cat left through the exit on the opposite side of the room. Also that Gargomon got tortured in a way.
12212.title: Odd Discovery

choices: ... keep him tied up for tickle pleasure
122121.content:
As you enter the room Gargomon heard your steps and starts struggling recklessly. You walk over to his head and look at him straight in the eyes in curiosity, then he looked at you back. You decide to ungag Gargomon.

"Are you with her?" Gargomon asked while trying to catch his breath.

"With who?" You reply.

"Oh, I guess your not with the cat girl that tried to tickle me to death." Gargomon said in relief.

"Excuse me, tickled you." You uttered in confusion.

"Did I stutter?." He said while trying to break free.

You look again at his feet, they resembled large bunny feet, and were still curling up but not as much as before. Then you wonder...
122121.title: Encounter with Gargomon

choices: You put your hands on his big soles and start tickling
You restrain yourself while Gargomon finishes attaching his hundguns
1221211.content:
"Just a second I'll help you out." You say. You start untying him by untying the restraint on his upper torso, then his waist area. The final restraint was on his ankles, you walk over to the side his feet where the buckle was located. While unbuckling the buckle you drift your head to the left to is his soles. He has pink pads on his three toes and one big pad on his heel, his toes were slowly wiggling. You start to shift your big blue hand slowly to sole to touch the big ball. "What are you doing?" Gargomon uttered which interrupted your hand. "Oh, nothing, just untying this last restraint." You say in shock. You untie the restraint while looking at his instep and wiggling toes.

"Finally! I've been here for days." Gargomon says while stretching his body out stiffness. "I gotta admit, at first I thought you were also going to tickle me once you came in the room because I thought you were looking at my feet. I guess I'm just being paranoid."

You don't say anything, you just sit down thinking about Gargomon's feet. "I see you don't talk much." He said. He walked to the corner were his holster and guns were he gets his holster then tries to attach his handguns. While in the process of reattaching his guns in a kneeling position with his feet behind him you notice his large bunny feet. The ball of both his feet were quite ample, so you quietly walk over to his feet, when at a good distance from his feet you can clearly see that his soles were soft like a pillows yet still stiff like a furry foot.

Gargomon starts to converse, "Man, I hope I never have to go through that again. If anyone ever tries that again, I'll kill them on the spot." you were just about to touch his massive sole until you heard what he said. "My feet are killing me right now." The temptation was now harsh on your brain. Gargomon then extended his toes so both his feet lay with the toes curled on the floor and both of his soles facing you.
1221211.title: Saving Gargomon

choices: find out just how ticklish he is
12212112.content:
"Poor feet," you mumble, although you didn't even mean to do that.

"You say something?" Gargomon asks absentmindedly, having a particularly hard time with getting his gun to stay snug.

"No, I..."

"What?"

"It sounds like your feet had a rough time. How about I massage them a bit while you finish with your guns?" You grin ear to ear at your quick thinking.

"Whatever."

You kneel down directly behind the paws and your mind does backflips. You inch your anticipating hands towards the collosal, fluffy feet and lay your hands on the waiting sole.

Gargomon jumps clear off the floor and wheels around with a gun in your face.

"What do you think you're doing?" Gargomon turns callous and his gun does not waver.

"I was just giving you a footrub. You said you wanted one." Your heart pounds in your throat and Gargomon does not waver.

"Oh, why didn't you say so?" He blushes and sits down. The heavenly bunny feet are inches from you now, and he turns around to grab the rest of his things. You breath a sigh of relief and grab the foot by either side. He pulls his foot back with a jump, but does not hit the ceiling.

"Why do you keep freaking out every time I touch your feet?" As soon as he slides it back into range, you grab it firmy on each side (although he could have easily pulled it from your grasp.)

"Cut me a break, will ya?" Gargomon is getting annoyed now, but immediately calms down when you start squeezing his paws in a rhythmic motion.

"Just how ticklish are you?" You ask absentmindedly while rolling your thumbs upward and deep into the soft flesh towards the ball.

"Ticklish enough for you not to worry about it," he snaps, while fiddling with his glove.
12212112.title: A stroke of brilliance

122121121.content:
After another moment, he stands up.

"But I wanted to keep massaging your feet!"

"You sure are strange. Help me get out of here and you can massage my feet all you want. But no tickling."

Your heart skips a beat in anticipation.

"Then let's get out of here! Follow me!"

You dash out the door and face a three-way choice. The way in front of you leads back to where you came from. Your chances are better left elsewhere.
122121121.title: The Great Escape

1221211211.content:
Gargomon stumbles behind you.

"Wait up, will you? I've been through a lot."

"I don't have to help you, I hope you know."

"Yeah, thanks for that, now slow down."

"I think I deserve a reward, don't you?"

"Like what?" snaps Gargomon crossly.

"Just let me tickle you a little after we get out of here."

You hear bullets fly around your head, and you duck. Gargomon is not happy.

"You could have ripped me apart! What's the big idea?"

"If I even hear you mention tickling again, you're a dead mon. Got it?"

"Got it. Relax."

"I'm having a hard time doing that now. Promise you won't even mention tickling anymore."

"I promise! Lets go." He pushes past you and down the hallway.

Without warning, Gargomon whines and falls down. Then, you notice a blowdart in your hip and you smack the floor.
1221211211.title: Nice guy

12212112111.content:
Your head feels like a brick. Either you hit the ground really hard, or whatever was in that dart is still coursing around in your system. The light is so bright that you can even see it through your eyelids. It isn't until you try to scratch your arm that you realise you arn't restrainted. You sigh in relief and you start to adjust to the light.

"Its about time you woke up." Through a window across from you and a story up you can see an Impmon speaking into a microphone. "Your friend here has been waiting."

Right across from you and excessively restrained sits an angry and gunless Gargomon. He pulls at his restraints fruitlessly, yet relentlessly.

"Its simple. Tickle your friend here and you get away tickle-free, or you get a treatment from a professional."

Gargomon slumps as much as he can, defeated, and begins to whimper. "But you promised! C'mon..."
12212112111.title: Interesting situations

122121121111.content:
"Did you hear how upset he got last time I even mentioned tickling? Now, I don't know if he's just being a big baby of If I would be just as ticklish in his body. But I'll bet that I can take a tickling a lot better than he can."

"Suit yourself!" A small valve in room starts spewing smoke.
122121121111.title: The Hero's stance

1221211211111.content:
You sit down to keep from falling down, and the gas fills your lungs. Your adrenaline pumps, but Gargomon's shouting soon fades away...


You wake up in a similar room. It might as well be the same room, but there is no sign of Gargomon. All around you are video cameras and they all are pointing back at you. At least 20 cameras hum and meekly beep, all waiting.
1221211211111.title: Good luck

12212112111111.content:
Oh god! Maybe this wasn't such... oh god!

I
don't
...
EEK!

The wicked sensation tingles your sole and creeps up your leg. The claws play on your thighs for a moment.

"Hiya, butterball!" Impmon sticks his stinking face right up against yours. Your legs are held slightly upwards at the thighs and straight forward from the knee down. You are sitting up, although slightly reclined, and your arms are crossed behind your head. "Hopefully your friend will be appreciative. He's watching right now. Say hi!" He pulls away so that you can see a camera directly in front of you.

Then, he can see you laughing. Impmon's gloves are long gone, and his mischevous little hands are going to work on your left side. You bend away as best you can until a single finger starts doodling around on your right side. He works up to your armpits, and you can feel your eyes rolling back into your head.
12212112111111.title: Here they come!

122121121111111.content:
But you can't relax! He keeps laying into your armpits and your chest is already starting to hurt. Once again, he pulls away. You pant like a dog, but your breath does not recover.

"So, where are you the most ticklish? Hmm.." Impmon mocks you while scratching his chin and circling your chair.

"Those ribs seem a little ticklish..." He scratches your ribs a bit, and you clench your jaw.

"But those hips look pretty ripe for the tickling, too." He pokes around and elicits a whine.

"You should have seen your face when I got your legs!" He rakes his claws across the tops of your thighs and you lock your muscles up. The laugh, however, escapes with ease.

"Havn't tried your tummy yet. Is it ticklish?" He goes to tickle it, but hovers his wiggling fingers only an inch above. "I'm talking to you here! I said, 'is your belly ticklish?'"

"Knock yourself out," you growl.

"Rude little bastard, arn't you?" He dribbles his fingers all over your tummy, working up to your neck, and down again.

He lays a loose pinch into your belly with each word. "I.Have.To.Teach.You.Some.Manners!"
122121121111111.title: Playing games

1221211211111111.content:
Gulp.


Feet. He's walking towards your feet and you bite your lip. You think you're going to cry.

"But these lovely little feet. Oh, they're beautiful. Soft, scentless, a little muscular, and oh so ticklish." He cracks his knuckles and raises his hands. Here it comes! He lowers his hands in a brushing motion, but doesn't even touch your feet. The anticipation alone makes you squeak and pull away. He repeats several times until grabbing your right foot with both hands. It doesn't tickle, so you look. Just that same moment, his evil little tongue streaks across your sole. You lose your mind and scream like a banshee. Your toes can't even pull away from the wet assult. You cry, you scream, and you thrash. But you do not beg. Without using his hands, his tongue runs up your left sole before shooting back to your right. His fingers dribble and lightly caress all over your feet. You want to kill him, or die, or something. He goes on for, oh who knows how long.
1221211211111111.title: Better get used to it

12212112111111111.content:
You quietly cry when he finally stops. Why, oh why, did you ever agree to this. Something presses against your sole.

"You know, your feet are a lot smaller than mine." He wiggles his sick little toes over the top of yours. "But they're a lot more ticklish (and I mean a LOT.) Sometimes I wish I was that ticklish. Looks like fun." He crawls up onto your body and lays down on you. "Is it?"

You spit on the side of his face, which he takes time whiping back on to yours.

"Well, maybe not."

And on he goes to tickle you for hours. He puts his fingers everywhere, but never pulls out any other tools. He doesn't have to.
12212112111111111.title: The eye of the storm

122121121111111111.content:
You feel your consciousness falling right through you, and any moment now...


The light is too harsh for you, but you squint through it and keep moving. You want to get that whole experience out of your mind, and your exhaustion is helping. It's a bit past mid day now, and the fall leaves are dancing. You're under a stone overhang which opens to a loosely collected forest. The fall winds are blowing and the trees sway with a simple melancholy. You should be thrilled to be out of that hell, but you're just exhausted.

There, on a splintering bench, is Gargomon. He's too busy looking at his feet to notice you, but you sit down anyways. The silence ticks on, and you join him in looking downwards.

All of a sudden, you feel his grasp and succumb to it. You can feel his crying through his embrace. It's nearly sufficating, but you don't mind.

"Thank you" is all he can whisper.

Your mind is so scrambled that all you can say is "Yes."
122121121111111111.title: Reunion

1221211211111111111.content:
Finally, after the crying had subsided, Gargomon speaks. "Do you have anywhere to go?"

You still have no idea how you ended up in that mansion, and you have no idea where you are. "No."

"Then you can stay with me for the time being. I live right over that mountain." He motions to a fairly large mountain straight in front of the overhang, but a ways off. It isn't until then that you notice that the land dips downwards to the left to a thin strip of beach. "Do you want to?"

You let a meager smile cross your face. "Sure."

"Good. It's a ways off, though, so we should start soon. We could either cut through the forest, which can get a little dangerous, or we can take the long route along the beach. It's your call."
1221211211111111111.title: Moving right along

12212112111111111111.content:
"Let's take to the beach. I can't fight anything right now." You strain to get up from the bench.

"I understand," says Gargomon flatly. He grabs his idle guns and snaps them onto the back of his belt. Then, he turns to you and holds out his hand. "Almost forgot. I'm Glenn."
12212112111111111111.title: Hit the Beach

choices: "Why, have a turkey in your back pocket?"
122121121111111111111.content:
Glenn flips around, flings you onto his shoulders, and immediately starts walking.

"Really? I would have expected something a bit more veemon-y."

"Well, that makes sense because I'm not a veemon."

"Could have fooled me" laughs Glenn. "You sure look like one."

"I do now, but I'm human."

"You what?" Glenn strains his neck to get another look at you and his path curves.

"I was a human before I woke up in that mansion. I thought you were too."

"Nah, I've always looked like this. Well, maybe a bit smaller" Glenn chuckles to himself.

On Glenn walks for hours, talking all the time. From your perch on his shoulders, you have little trouble staying awake. He seems a nice enough guy. At least nicer than before you were captured. Why do you let yourself keep thinking about that?

"Are you getting hungry yet?"
122121121111111111111.title: Small Talk

1221211211111111111111.content:
"I can do better than that!" The thin strip of beach has a bit of earthy overhang about ten feet up that stretches over the sands. He sets you down near the wall and immediately begins ripping dead roots from it. He throws them down in a pile a good five feet from you. He has the sense to stand in front of you so he can open fire into it sideways. It catches fire a couple seconds into the fire and starts fanning it with his ear. "Do you think you can keep this going for a few minutes?"

"Yeah, sure." You start grabbing lower roots off the wall, but mainly keep watching Glenn. He steps out into the glowing water and starts looking around. His right arm grabs a gun and starts tracking a fish. His arms follows carefully; he does not blink. He sends out a single bullet and is obviously pleased with the shot. He continues popping fish and pulling them out of the water with his other hand. When he starts walking back, you blow vigorously on the smoldering fire.

"Yeah, I see something coming there." He throws a handful of fish on the fire (and a handful for him is a lot.) Every last one has a shot through the head. "Know how to clean fish at all?"

"Not really," you clamor.

"That's alright. Just keep the fire going." He finds a spent bullet casing, smashes it flat, and uses the flattest edge like a knife to slit the fishes' guts open. Glenn has no trouble scraping the entrails out, and easily cleans out ten-something fish by the time the fire is going.


You use your new claws to tear the finished fish open along their sides. All work done, you both collapse against the overhang's wall as the sky begins to burn orange.

"I can't thank you enough for what you did back there" says a well-fed Gargomon.

"Don't mention it," you murmur between bites.

"No, really. It took a lot to do what you did. I know I never could have, not even for my own brother. If there's anything I can do to help make it up to you, just name it."
1221211211111111111111.title: Dinner Time

12212112111111111111112.content:
"I know it didn't go over too well last time, but... Well, you know."

Gargomon chuckles quietly to himself. "Persistant little bugger, arn't ya? Well, you definitely deserve it. You still just want the feet?"
12212112111111111111112.title: I think we know where this is going

122121121111111111111121.content: "Big suprise. Sorry if I'm a little jumpy, but there really isn't anything around here to hold me down with around here."
122121121111111111111121.title: This just keeps getting better

choices: "That's a little wierd. How about I just bury you."
1221211211111111111111212.content:
"Well, I could always bury you in the sand," you suggest.

"I'm up for it," shrugs Glenn. "Though, I did swipe a teleknife on the way out of that place."

Glenn whips out a short red sword and spins it between his fingers.
1221211211111111111111212.title: Can't keep him free

choices: "That's a little too wierd for me"
12212112111111111111112122.content:
"I can do better than that!" he exclaims with a hint of pride. To your horror, he promptly slits his own left wrist, and the knife goes through like a knife through butter.

The shock has lodged a lump in your throat, until he holds up the severed hand. "Perfect!" he claims, and the fingers wiggle as if nothing happened.

"Whaaa...?" He flips the hand over and shows you the severed edge. It's perfectly smooth and fur-colored without a drop of blood.

You brace yourself on his thigh and lean in for a better look. Etranced by the sheer wierdness, you stretch to touch the severed edge. "Can't feel a thing there," he explains, "But the rest I can feel just fine." Glenn grasps his own hand and plugs it into his arm.

"So, you want to try this out?"
12212112111111111111112122.title: What did you expect, something normal?

choices: Just have some fun with him
122121121111111111111121221.content: "Alright then! That makes things easy for me." Glenn rolls up his jeans until he has a clear view of his own ankles. He carves through both ankles in a single swipe and moves his feet out of the way of his legs. "There ya go, little buddy," he says with a smile while placing his pudgy feet right in front of you. "Remember, you said you would go easy on me." Glenn scoots up next to you on your left side and leans against the wall. You place his left foot on your lap while leaving his right foot overturned against your right hip. You flip his bunny foot over and crack your knuckles.
122121121111111111111121221.title: Getting down to business

choices: You sleep soundly through the night
1221211211111111111111212211.content:
You lean back against his flabby fur and drag the foot up closer on your lap. The plump toes lie to the right and rest on the edge of your thigh. You decide to start on the arch, however, which is facing away from you. You brace the heel with your left hand and gently rake your claws across the arch and to the toes. Glenn lets out a sickeningly cute giggle and his toes wiggle slightly. You jump your right hand to the toe closest to you and start doodling on the pad. Glenn jumps at the touch and keeps giggling. You keep tickling lighter and gentler, but he keeps laughing. Only a single finger slides around the pad and Glenn's laugh reduces to a whimper.

"You really wern't kidding, were you?"

"hmm mmm" is all Glenn can muster without cracking.

All of a sudden, you lay into his sole. Both claws scritch around the ball of his foot, and you can feel his body trembling with laughter. His foot curls up instinctively, so you drag your claws across his thick heel. Your hands fall to the sides of his heel, and you end up tickling even the tops of his feet. Glenn covers his face with his ears to muffle his sweet laughing. You stop for a moment so he can relax.

"Heeee-uh! You know what you're doing!" The Gargomon peeks over one of his ears.

"Just a bit," you tease, and run your palms from the center to the ends. "Go on, relax." He whimpers, but eventually his bunny foot relaxes. You slowly reach below the toes, but he curls them up. "Come on, let me in there..." You coax the toes open, but the anticipation is killing him. You cup a hand over his middle toe and reach for the meat right below his toe. Glen yips and tries to curl his toe up, but your right hand keeps it out so that your left hand can play on the flesh. His toe overpowers your hand and catches your left hand in the fold. You dart your right hand to his other foot and tickle it all over. You continue to tickle both his feet gently and teasingly until Glenn laughs himself to sleep. After caressing the lovely paw for a short time more, consciousness slips from your grasp. You nuzzle in between him and the overhang and are cuddling his paw by the time you fall asleep.
1221211211111111111111212211.title: At last

choices: Its just a dream.. heh heh
12212112111111111111112122112.content: Piercing golden light shone from the groggy water. A sharp wind had kicked up and made ghastly howling against the overhang's fissures. You think you are dreaming, enveloped in the darkness, when the light starts coming closer. The light seperates into two and they continue their silent glide.
12212112111111111111112122112.title: Light on the Water

122121121111111111111121221122.content: They're not lights. Those are eyes. Big, glowing eyes, and they're not loosing any speed. They blinked. There is no question that they are coming straight towards you. You have to wake Glenn up.
122121121111111111111121221122.title: Nightmare

choices: Wait until you can see the creature before you act
1221211211111111111111212211222.content:
You tickle Glenn's paws frantically; his toes wiggle and he stirs, but he is too tired to wake. You let the paw slide off your lap and lay your claws into his side. He laughs silenty. He's probably having a nice dream about being tickled right now.

The eyes are at the edge of the water now, but the meager fire can't illuminate the rest of the figure.
1221211211111111111111212211222.title: For once, he doesn't resist

choices: Try to wake Glenn up again.
12212112111111111111112122112221.content:
A bug-eyed creature creeps out of the water on two legs. It's shaped like a small human (albeit larger than yourself) with an oversized head. Its skin is a paler blue than your own with similar ears. A sogging mop of green and blue hair streaks from its smooth head. It steps into the firelight, and you know it has spotted you. It opens its low, toothy mouth wide, and you recoil with fear. It takes you a moment to realize that the thing is actually smiling.

The creature approaches your cowering frame, sits down, and props its feet up on your knee.
12212112111111111111112122112221.title: The creature cometh

choices: Does that mean I should tickle him?
122121121111111111111121221122211.content:
The creature just smiles at you and begins to wave its feet around. You continue looking back at it, dumbstruck.

A few seconds pass, and it wiggles a single finger in the air. A deep, rounded, yet somehow nasily voice rolls out of him to make a single sound: "Tee. Tee."
122121121111111111111121221122211.title: Huh?

1221211211111111111111212211222111.content: What else could that mean. You curl down to see his feet. A pair of little, four-toed feet wave around happily on your knee. Each smooth toe sharpens to a point like an upside-down water droplet, and his heels feel cold agains t you. You brush the sand off his feet. Although they look rather sharp, the soles are deceptively soft; so, you immediately tickle into the soles. The creature twists around happily, but has little trouble keeping his feet on your leg. You try all over his feet; his heels seem to be particularly ticklish, and he is loving every minute of it. Without warning, he restracts his feet and slaps his own knees. Apparently, he thinks its your turn.
1221211211111111111111212211222111.title: Making friends

choices: Try to tickle Glenn awake again
Try to wake him up some other way
12212112111111111111112122112221111.content: A bit apprehensive about the last time, you prop your feet up on his leg. The monster holds your feet from behind with one hand and starts tickling with the other. This is much different from your last time, however, and you don't mind keeping your feet on his leg. He focuses on the balls of your feet, and you realise you're actually having fun. Suddenly, he stops and lets your feet down. Now what?
12212112111111111111112122112221111.title: Why not?

122121121111111111111121221122211111.content:
Glenn has to see this! You hoist one of the massive paws onto your lap again and dig both hands into the soft fur of his heel. The monster laughs some and grabs the other paw. He starts laying into the other sole with both hands. Glenn wiggles around in his sleep, which quickly escalates to giggling. You let your left hand dig into his side while your right stays on his paw, and the laugh starts becoming more audible. Finally, his eyes snap open.

"Heeyaahaha!! I'm awake, I'm awake!" You slow down your mischevous hands and doodle on the paw. "Occo!" he shouts with glee.

"Gaaaarrhh!" proclaims the monster and pounces on Garth. The two hug for a moment, laughing all the while. "Gyoouh woowie wa guyaboo!" The creature's voice sounds like gargling, except without the rhythmic drum of water.

"I'm fine now, thanks to my friend here!" Glenn puts an arm around your shoulder and nearly knocks you over in doing so.

"You know this thing?" you ask, shocked.

"I've known Occo since I was your height! I assume you two've met by now?"

"I guess so, if that's meeting."

"I'll take that as a yes," declares Glenn contentedly. "Glooyi payo wa wapiyu ooieo?"

"You can talk to that thing!?" you exclaim, amazed. "What's it saying?"

"Glooyaa pwohpaaa glooi pwee!" chirps the monster. Glenn lets out a tickled laugh before translating. "He says, 'stop calling me a thing'."

You grin back at the goofy creature. "He can understand me, too?"

"Yep!" Glenn grabs the creature across his chest and tickles him playfully with his ear.

"Well, if he's not a 'thing', then what is he?" you ask mockingly.

"Occo's an Oxi. Never seen one, I take it?"

"Never even heard of them" you reply.

"Gooshi ga shigaa nyoo shoo gooiyaloogi!" Occo points along the beach in the direction you were traveling.

"Well, you want to?" Glenn looks at you innocently.

"Want to what?" You shrug and laugh.

"Spend the night with his school? They're right down the beach about twenty minutes from here."

"Uhh..."
122121121111111111111121221122211111.title: Wakeup call

choices: Stick with Glenn to help bridge the language gap
1221211211111111111111212211222111111.content:
"Sure, I guess."

"Great! I havn't seen his school together since last season." Glenn snatches his paws back and snaps them on to his legs; apparently, the motions seem entirely natural to him. He holds a hand out to each of you and tosses each of you onto your own shoulder. Glenn speaks to Occo in his normal voice as he walks, which is enough for you to pick up on the gist of the conversation.

He rounds a corner in the wall, and a blazing bonfire greets you. Scattered around it are nearly a hundred Oxis. Many eat, some more sleep, and the remainder are busy fooling around. "Wwwooopoe!" cries an enthusiastic Occo with a fist in the air.

Almost the entire flock turns to look; a couple of the sleepers even wake eachother up. They chatter happily and rush to greet you. Glenn starts answering back in their language while walking through the crowd. You have absolutely no idea what they are talking about.
1221211211111111111111212211222111111.title: Showing up late

12212112111111111111112122112221111112.content:
"I'll be around here if you need me" you explain absentmindedly and jump off his shoulder. Before running off you think to grab the teleknife out of his pocket. You untie the decorative knot on the sheath and use it to fix the knife to your waist.

Burning a hole in the night, the blazing fire draws you to it. Several Oxi perk up and crowd around you to get a better look. Chattering happily, about ten Oxi plop down in front of you and pile their feet on your leg. Just as you guessed, this is a regular greeting for them. Unfortunately, the weight of all those feet is hurting your leg. So, you unsheath the knife, which glows menacingly in the firelight. They yip and shout and jump away from the knife with several of the smaller ones cowering behind the larger ones. Several more come over to look at the commotion.

To make them understand, you slice one of your own feet off. Several shriek at the sight, but settle down once they see that you are still smiling. You place your foot a ways out in front of you, but none of them will approach it. You take your other foot off, place it next the the first, and crawl back a short ways. Finally, a small Oxy reaches towards your feet. He picks one up tentatively and examines it. Curiously, he scratches a tiny finger along your sole, which manages to tickle a bit. He smiles at your reaction and starts gently tickling. Your other foot is snatched up into the crowd, and the feet pile up on your lap without any more hesitation. The knife slides through all twenty-something pairs, leaving you buried in a pile of wiggling oxy feet. You pick up a single foot and quickly tickle the far edge of it. Its rather obvious which one that foot belongs to: the rather large oxy who erupts into laughter. Many reach into the pile to snatch up random feet. The knife soon disappears as well, and several more feet end up in the pile.

All the time that you are tickling your way through the pile, you can feel your own two feet going through ridiculous amounts of tickling. Fingers skittle up your soles, doodle across your heels, and poke around between your toes. Now and then, a slippery tongue finds its way up your giggling foot. Its a blissful escape to not to have to keep from pulling your feet away. The happy fingers dance across your sensitive soles, and it feels wonderful. Meanwhile, your own fingers reach through the pile and under countless toes. The pile is taller than yourself, and it shakes with laughter. The camp is thick with laughter, and you even see Glenn's foot sailing across the crowd. You crawl your way to it and snatch it from the raving oxis. This time, you show no mercy. Your fingers dance all around the poor sole, which thrashes about with laughter as if to beg for mercy.

The tickles last long into the night, and it is not until whoever was holding your feet last had worn themselves out enough to give you a chance to rest. Even as you fall asleep, a single finger circles the ball of your foot ever so gently.
12212112111111111111112122112221111112.title: Oxi party!

122121121111111111111121221122211111121.content:
You wake up long after sunrise to find your feet (as well as the knife) laying beside you. Thankfully, you return your feet to their proper places and get to them. Most of the camp is empty; presumably, they are off to catch fish or whatnot. You see a green horn peeking over the edge of the sand near the water, and move in closer to find Glenn still talking with one of the Oxis. He turns at the sound of your footsteps.

"Ready to take off, little buddy?"

"Yeah, sure" you reply, recovering from a minor headache. "Where are we going again?"

"Alcrux. Only twenty minutes off from my place, cause its on the edge of town."

"Let's do it then."

"You mind walking this time? I'm a little sore right now."

Although you knew you helped with that, you bite your lip. "No problem."

You start off along the beach abreast, including Occo.

Without any warning, you trip on an overgrown root and hit the ground full force.
122121121111111111111121221122211111121.title: Roll out

1221211211111111111111212211222112.content:
You continue to wait, the creature sighs while trying to think of a way to tell you what it is saying. First it draws a sketch in the sand, but you can tell what the drawing is. Then the creature lift it's foot to you, makes a tickling motion with it's hands, starts a fake laughter, and wiggles it toes in your face. You think it wants you to tickle it, so you grab his foot that is in front of your face, the creature smiles so you tickle it's large foot ball a little, it starts to laugh alot despite you are trying very hard. "You feet are pretty sensitive are they.", you say, you decide to stop. The creature is panting with it's tongue out, while it's getting it's breathe you decide to rub it foot on your cheek.
While your doing this you realize the creature grabs your foot. The creature tickles you and you start laughing. After it's done you lay down to catch your breathe while the creature looms over you. You sit up, the creature smiles innocently at you. Then the creature looks behind him, you look too and see a another creature like the one you just tickled, but this creature looks like a female. It runs to the male creature and they both give each other a little tickle. They start talking in a strange language, then the male creature introduces the female creature to you. She jumps in joy, sits down, and props her feet on your legs. I guess she wants a tickle too you think, you take one her feet and glide your claws on the wrinkles between her ball and heel, She lets out a big laugh. Afterwords she lies down, the male creature rubs her belly.
While watching something big and soft is on your back. The two creature look behind you in surprise, slowly and fearfully you look behind you, you see it's...
1221211211111111111111212211222112.title: More signs please

12212112111111111111112122112221121.content:
It's big, white, has pink pads, black toeclaws, you realize it Glenn's foot. "Glenn, you almost scared the crap out of me.", you say, "Sorry,", Glenn replies, "I just woke up and I didn't know what my foot was doing.". Glenn gets his foot off of you, sits up and yawns. As he is stretching he wiggles his toes in front of you. The two creatures run in front of him smiling.

"Glenn, do you know these two.", you say
"I don't know them, but the girl, I saved her from the tickle mansion.", Glenn replied
The two creatures try to pull the both of you somewhere.

"I think they want us to follow them somewhere.", said Glenn
12212112111111111111112122112221121.title: Glenn's Foot

choices: Put your foot in the slot

While following the creatures Glenn tells you he read a website that says the creatures are called Dioxyls, they have fair intelligence, enigmatic skin, a long life-span, sensitive skin, and a foot/tickle fetish. He also mentions that they greet each other with tickling.
The Dioxyls stop at a hut (probably made by the Dioxyls). Everyone goes in the hut, lucky it big enough for Glenn and everyone else. The female Dioxyl gave Glenn large foot a big hug, then talks to the male Dioxyls. The two Dioxys give us the hand gesture to stay in the hut.
A while later Glenn takes a quick nap and you look around the hut, you notice a slot coming from the side of one of the walls. On the other side of the wall is a forest, you walk to the slot, it has a symbol of a Dioxyl foot getting tickled by a feather above it. The slot is big enough for a Dioxyl to stick it's foot in, come to think of it your feet (that are now the feet of Veemon) are the size of Dioxyl feet.

You got closer to the slot and raise your left foot and hold it left from the slot at the wall to look, if your foot really would be fitting there. The Slot was not very cold until yet and you pushed slowly more and more in until you felt that your foot get pressed against something hard. You smiles and then suddenly, heard a metallic snap from it and you tried to pull your foot out again but it was locked in it it seems. Soon, three more feathers joined and sawing between your toes in and out constant and lightly during the other feather draws smaller circles around your heel and switch with the first one the places that they dance around your edges of your foot, the inside of your arch and on your heel and balls. he jumps on you tickles your ribs you go insane. there are hand slots in the

walls. he puts your hands in them. they get locked in. he puts your other foot in the wall. it gets locked. he grabs a feather and starts to tickle your ribs. you laughs

"have a fun month"

wall. he puts your hands in there.

hey quit messing with that kid another one says.

"A COUPLE OF DAYS"
122121121111111111111121221122211211112.title: no

1221211211112.content:
You hit the ground, hard, and try to keep from moving.

"If the smoke took you out that quick, you're not as tough as you think."

The smoke has stopped and Impmon has a foot pressed on your cheeck.

But you're still awake.
1221211211112.title: The Joker

choices: Go for the big purple feet
12212112111121.content: Impmon foot rubs and taps on your cheek as he thinks your sleeping. Impmon walks away , you look across the room to see Gargomon fell asleep from the smoke. Impmon moans as if he is getting suspicious, Impmon sits down beside you and starts tickling your side. Try not to move, luckily Impmon dosen't notice you tearing. Impmon finally stops, "I guess he can take a tickle better than Gargomon.". Impmon turns on his stomach so his is parallel to you and facing your feet, his feet are also beside your head. Your surprise that not only do his feet look like your feet, but are also a little bigger. You feel something wet and meaty on your sole, Impmon is licking your feet. You realize you can't take this any longer and you are going to have to blow your cover, but also if Impmon's feet is as ticklish as Gargomon's feet you can probably overpower Impmon.

choices: You break out the window leaving Gargomon
You find another way out. You can't leave Gargomon

"AAAAAH!", You yell out. "Aha! Gotcha!", Impmon yelled. He keeps licking your feet. You take out a smoke bomb and activate it. You them put on a gas mask.
