122121121111211.title: Just give up

choices: West (maybe you can get a session out of him before you leave)
North-West (screw it! turn him in and enjoy the mansion)
1221211211112112.content:
You carry your friend on your back, desperately looking for a map, or a sign, a clue that'd tell you the way to safety.
Suddenly you hear Gargomon's voice in your ea,r and realize that he has come by.

"Hey man, I just wanted to thank you for watching my back. I've never had somebody take care of me before. The only people I met here are tickle-loving creeps. I guess decent people sometimes exist even in a place like this."

You struggle with your words; you don't know how to admit it to him that you're a fetishist too who is totally turned on by his feet. If he learned what you are thinking he'd probably abandon you too.

"Put me down, I can walk om my own two feet now. Tell you what, I'll go and scout ahead a bit. Got to keep my partner out of the fire" he slaps you on the back. "eh, pal?"

He runs ahead on the corridor, weapons in hand. As happy as you are to be called a friend, you realize that Gargomon would never willingly go along with your weird hobbies.

As you are thinking, you suddenly notice something. There is writing on the wall but it was too faint for you and Gargomon to see it before. An arrow points South and the writing over it says: "Bing's Mansion Great Entrance, 500 m". Another arrow points West to "private torture suites", and North-West to "Tickler HQ and training rooms".
You suddenly feel guilty - you just thought that if you wanted a session with Gargomon's feet, maybe it'd be better for you if the two of you did not leave the mansion at all.
But could you betray his trust like that?

Gargomon arrives. "Nothing ahead in the next 100 meters either way. It seems we have to guess which way we go to find the exit. What do you think?"
1221211211112112.title: You can't leave Gargomon

122121121111212.content:
You jump up and with a quick leap and tackle, you bring Impmon to the ground. You end up on his back and with his feet in your lap.
"Jackpot!" you shout. "Now, your ass is mine!"
You start to spider your fingers along his soles and...Nothing happens. Nil! What misfortune: you have encountered one of the rare inhabitants of Bing's Tickle Mansion who is ummone to foot tickling!

"Nice try" he says with a bored face. "Now it's my turn to show you how it's done." He pulls your feet from under you and wraps his legs around your ankles. You shout for him to stop, but naturally, he ignores you, and starts to methodically tease your toes turning you into a giggling mess.

You realize that you lost this fight, you're screwed unless...Maybe there is some OTHER area where Impmon is ticklish? Ashot in the dark, but it may be your last chance.
122121121111212.title: Go for the big purple feet

choices: Exploit his helplessness and make him your tickle slave
Tie him up and save Gargomon
Keep up the teasing until he agrees to obey your every word
1221211211112122.content:
You don't even know what you're thinking - maybe it's a reflex you picked up while dealing with dogs and cats. But you reach out and scratch the base of Impmon's ear. The next thing you notice is that he let go of your feet. The mighty Impmon is on the floor in a trance like state, strenght apparently gone from his body. He tries to get to his feet but you grab his earlobe and give it a little pull. He moans and drops to his knees again.

You cover your mouth. This is so funny. You grab both ears and start kneading them, delighting in the sounds that come out of Impmon. You decide to check if his neck is ticklish too, with great success. So is his entire face and he entertains you with great grimaces whenever you touch his nose or cheek.

"Whaa, whaat are you trying to do..." he says weakly.

Hmm. What SHOULD you do?
1221211211112122.title: Try the ear! (you're victorious)

choices: I would rather just tickle you really
Well, I can think of something...
1221212.content:
"You sure are rude," you say matter-of-factly.

"Sorry," he spits out. "Could you get me out of here?"

"Yeah," you claim absentmindedly while approaching his gargantuan paws. Your hand is drawn up to the sole on your right.

"Uh..." the digimon sloppily interjects.

"I see why someone would want to tickle you, though." Your hand slowly brushes around his foot, which tenses up. A small whine escapes him.

"How about you ...uh.. rub my feet instead?" Gargomon clammers, grasping at straws.

"I would rather tickle you first, actually." Your finger scritches along his meaty, feathery-soft sole.

"whh-ho-ho-ho! Just let me out and I'll do something for you!"

"Like what?" You ask slyly.

"Whatever! You name it! I don't care! Let me out of here!"
1221212.title: Moving in

12212121.content:
"Nahhh, I think I would rather just have some big bunny feet to tease."

With that, you pinch the padded parts of both his feet and they give to your touch. The monstrously large bunny thrashes and flails, whining and giggling and pleading. And you've barely even begun.

It's difficult to rake your claws down those quivering insteps because they keep dancing around. Fortunately the restraints include a few bands that let you tie his toes back, and by the claws themselves so none of that trembling flesh is covered or obscured. You tie one whole foot back and run your claws down his sole like a scratching post. Gargomon screams bloody murder and runs out of pleas in record time.

"PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE PL--OHGOD!! YYAAAHAAEEEEHEEEAAAA!!"

Every time he tries to steel himself for the next attack, for a good heel-spidering or toe-tweaking, the failure just gets sillier and sillier. You ram a finger between those plump toes and slowly waggle it around. Your bunny contorts his face heavily and breathes deep, trying to deal with the assault, and he fails miserably.

After tying his other foot back, which was a big struggle, you find that the outside edges of his feet are especially sensitive. Just a few light brushes from your claws, ever so slowly, bring him right back to begging mode.

"EEEHHHNNYYYTHIIINGG!! THIS IS...HORRIBLE!!"

You step it up a notch, tickling him madly, taking him far past the point of talking or laughing to a place where he can't even make noise. He's twisting and pulling at his restraints, pushing them as far as they can go, and his fur is shiny with sweat. You can feel the tension in his toes.

His pudgy, heaving belly catches your eye and you let him have a break so you can watch him breathe. You're thinking of pouncing on it and finding some more torturous spots to prod. At the same time, his padders are flexing and cowering, incredibly pudgy, and you kind of want to give them a taste.
12212121.title: I would rather just tickle you really

122121212.content:
You slowly drag your tongue across Gargomon's thick soles, and he explodes into a deafening laugh. His feet tremble as your tongue glides across his pudgy soles, causing his cacophonous laughter to fill the air.

"OHGOOOD! PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE STOOOP! YAHAHAEAYAHAHAHAHA! NOOOO!"

He twists and thrashes trying to escape his tight restraints, but to no avail. His toes squirm with tension as you lick in between his toes and across his fleshy pads. His toes strain and push on the tight bands as you drag your tongue across his thick, meaty paws. Gargomon pleads and begs for you to stop as you glide your torturous tongue down the sides of his feet.

"YAHAHEAHAEHAHAHA! NOOO! AAAANNNYYTTHING! GODNOOOO!"

You move your tongue more rapidly, swirling around his plump soles as he piercingly begs for you to stop. He tries desperately to escape, but his frantic attempts are in vain. His delicate bunny paws gleam with sweat and saliva.

As you taste Gargomon's hypersensitive soles, you notice the gag you removed previously.
122121212.title: Lick those feet

1221212121.content:
You stand up and walk beside Gargomon as he gasps for air and wiggles his toes frantically.

"You are really loud you know." you say tantalizingly.

"WELL SOOORRY! YOU'RE THE ONE TICKLING ME TO DEATH! HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO BE QUIETER!?" Gargomon yells savagely.

"Like this." you say as you shove the gag back into Gargomon's mouth.

"MMMMRRRPPPPPHHH!" Gargomon screams into the gag, muffling his vociferous complaints.

You walk back over to Gargomon's pudgy feet and sit yourself down as Gargomon struggles ferociously in his bonds. You begin to poke and scratch teasingly at his sweat-glossed feet. He whines into his gag as he tries to pull away from your soft touch. You waggle your finger in between his toes several times enticingly. Each time his mute laugh rings out gripingly.

Suddenly, you hear footsteps coming from outside. You dart your head around the room, looking for somewhere to hide. A large drawer catches your attention. You rush behind the drawer as a figure enters the room; Gargomon begins to squirm frenziedly.
1221212121.title: Silence is Golden

choices: Try to sneak out of the room
12212121212.content:
A catgirl wearing glasses and a lab coat walks into the room.
"Good evening to you, Gargomon! Break time's over! Time to

Gargomon mmphs and struggles, trying to indicate that thanks to you he did not get a break at all, but luckily for you he can not make an understandable sound.

The catgirl shuffles some papers on the desk, then pauses.

"Hmm. Did I really gag him before I left? Oh well." She shrugs and returns to her tasks. Suddenly two guards burst into the room.

"Excuse us, Doctor. A new ticklee escaped and we fear he is walking around messing with things."

Dr. Catgirl gives them a puzzled look. "Well, there's no ticklee here - except for Gargomon here, who's "helping" me with my experiment. Whoa, look at him, he's roarin' to go!"

"Mmmph, mmph" Gargomon says angrily.

The guards leave but you realize that if she removes the gag, Gargomon is going to tell on you.
You quickly must find another hiding place...or make sure that Gargomon is not in a position to tell her anything.
12212121212.title: You remain hidden

choices: Tickle him and get out of here
Ask the doctor if there are any other experiments
Charm her, she could make a fine ally (and she's pretty gullible)
122121212123.content:
You suddenly realize what you need to do. You step out from your hiding place. The Doctor freezes when she sees you. You walk over to her confidently.
"Good evening, Doctor. I am the new 'ler assigned here by HQ, who are very interested in the results of your experiment. And may I say, your hair looks lovely today!" You half scold yourself for using such a cheesy compliment, but to your surprise she blushes and act flustered. This is going to be easier than you thought! Looks like this girl is a total klutz!

"And could you please show me where you are with your experiment, which is..."

"Oh! Of course. We are trying to disprove the hypothesis that it is possible to tickle somebody to death. We carefully remove all of the other elements, like..."
"...Breath, nerve damage and so on?"
"Spot on! Until nothing remains but tickling. Then we administer large dosages, for example on this Gargomon here...Oh, just a second, let me remove his gag..."
"DON'T!" you say quickly. "Er, I mean, don't you think the gag help to ensure that he isn't damaged by, say, shouting and laughing too much?"
Oh. I didn't think of it that way before..." She perks up. "Well, the only thing we can do is test that idea by experiment!"
"Indeed! And right away!"
"Perfect! I think I like you, you seem to have the same passion for science."

And while you're doing that you can safely tickle the Gargomon until he faints and then get out of here, you tell yourself. The Gargomon stares at you furiously as you approach him but there isn't a single thing he can do.
122121212123.title: Head on approach is the best

1221212121231.content:
You watch as the catgirl scientist walks over to the drawer that you made your somewhat "daring" escape behind, as she shuffles through one of the cluttered drawers. With a beaming expression on your face, you turn towards Gargomon, pointing a devilish smirk towards him as he grunts into the gag.

"Man, Gargomon, you really are roarin' to go! ," she says, turning with a large toolbox in hand before sitting down in front of Gargomon's now squirming paws.

You quickly follow suit, before inquiring: "So, what's in the box?"

"Heavy duty tickling apparatus," she responds, while flipping multiple locks open on the surface of the box, "There's many elements regarding the intensity of the stimulation bring applied, as well as enhancing the sensitivity of such areas,"

Looking in to the toolbox, you notice that she really wasn't exaggerating with the term "heavy duty". Bulky, robotic-looking devices lined with rotating spinning brushes, thick, large gags, padded blindfolds, steel cords and rope, vials containing various clear liquids, and many other bizarrely unexplainable items.

She pulls out a clear vial of liquid, pops the cap off, and begins to smear and massage the clear liquid onto Gargomon's soles. Gargomon whimpers at first, but then seems to enjoy the relaxation provided my the masseuse-like grip of the catgirl, as she kneads her thumbs into his tense toes and soles.

"This is one of our highest concentration and strength oils we've developed in our labs here. It will increase the sensitivity of Gargomon's paws multiple times higher than before," she says, taking the time to demonstrate this effect by dragging her claws down Gargomon's now shiny and smooth soles.

"MMMPPHUEHPHH!!" Gargomon exclaims, in reaction to his increasingly soft to the touch paws.

"What other sources of stimuli will we apply to his paws during the tickling...er... experiment?", you say, attempting to mask the excitment in your voice with the most scientific masquerade you can.

"Well I'm glad you asked!", she says, evidently continuing to be fooled by your thinly veiled disguise, "Here we have a device that will heat up that oil on his feet in order to further its effects,". She pulls out a strange-looking metal block, as she tightly straps it to the stocks, covering Gargomon's now cowering and sheepish feet entirely, as he violently struggles to be let go.

"Now all we have to do is wait for these feet to heat up, and we should be able to begin!" She says, flipping a switch on the side of the heater.

"Wait a minute, are you sure there aren't any other things we can use for the experiment?", you interject, as Gargomon makes a muffled scoff into the gag.

"Look in here!", you say, as you scuffle through the toolbox and pull out a blindfold, "Wouldn't this blindfold help with the err... element of surprise?"

"Actually, yes, I think that's an excellent idea!" she responds.

"Wow, that really worked? I wonder what other things I can convince her to use on Gargomon..." you think to yourself.

About 10 minutes later, you've exhausted her supply of tickling and restrainment tools. Gargomon has his ears plugged, blindfolded, and belly being oiled as well. As the heater grows hotter, Gargomon struggles, whines, and moans loudly. Evidently, the heater is well tenderizing his soft bunny paws.

"Wow, I really appreciate your passion for accurate and precise experimentation! I can definitely see why you became a scientist..." she says, blushing. "Anyways!" she interrupts, clearly flustered, "I'm sure we can remove the heating apparatus now, given by Gargomon's reactions to it; we don't want to hurt him or damage any tissue,".

You lean down to flip the switch of the heater off as Gargomon's struggles begin to grow more ferocious, and his moans and groans increase greatly in volume. Upon removing the device from the stocks, you can see that his paws have shifted to a color of deep pink and red, clearly impacted by the effects of the heat. The thick coat of oil remains covering every crevice of his paws, causing them to gleam brightly in the light of the room, emphasizing the smooth arch and plumpness of his soles. As his toes press against their ties to the stocks, you slowly drag a claw down his shimmering and reddened soles, eliciting a sudden and surprising jerk and cloud of surpressed laughter from Gargomon, as he whines loudly into the gag.

"Now it's finally time to administer the treatment," she says, as she pulls out a skeletal looking frame covered in rotating brushes. She snaps the framework to the outline of the stocks, as the two largest brushes press themselves deeply into the tender flesh of Gargomon's soles. The other smaller brushes cover the balls of his feet, the heels, the sides of the soles, as well as the toes. Some if the brushes are even wedged tightly in between the toes, covering every spot and vulnerability that Gargomon poses. As the frame is fitted into place, the plush and soft brushes just surfacing themselves against Gargomon's hypersensitive flesh elicits a strong reaction where Gargomon struggles and moans against the impending torture he knows he's about to face. Gargomon begins to drool out of the gag, seeming to fully acknowledge and accept his fate and he whimpers and whines into the shiny gag.

"Why don't you do the honors?" the catgirl suggests, gesturing towards a switch on the front of the device. Gargomon begins to shake his head and struggle more, awaiting his treatment with resurfacing opposition.
1221212121231.title: For... Science?

1221212121232.content:
"By chance, are there any other experiments that are currently going on that I could help with?" you ask, trying to impose the most scientific and inquisitive tone upon yourself.

         "Actually, there are! We're planning on testing some new equipment in the room directly across the hall, and we're also testing out some gels and oils that increase sensitivity in the room 3 doors down, although no one is in those rooms right now... but I'm sure that you're smart enough to manage the experiments on your own," she replies.

         Perfect. A chance to engage in some more tickling, minus the science, you think to yourself.

         "Thanks, I think I'll go do that," you say, trying to hide your excitement. "Oh, and... um... maybe you could come back here and help if you finish early..." she says, blushing. "Sure! I'd be happy to do that when I finish!", you reply, trying to flatter her as much as possible, "Alright, have fun you two!". "MMMPH!" Gargomon grunts, as you walk out the door with a huge grin on your face.

So, which room do you enter?
1221212121232.title: "Scientific Curiosity"

choices: Pull the rope labeled "Gag Removal" and ask him some questions before ti
12212122.content:
"Yeah, I can think of something" you say, lightly dragging a finger up and down the digimon's sole.
"What?" Gargomon says, straining hard to keep the giggling in.
"Ever since I've been here, I've had a question... are dragons ticklish?"
"Hehe, of course they are!" Gargomon says, still trying to get his foot away from your tracing finger
"Well, then... can you lead me to some dragons?" You ask, tapping the bunny digimon's sole with a finger.
"Of course! Just stop that tickling and untie me!" Gargomon says amidst a fit of giggles.
"Alright then" you say as you untie him, giving him a few quick tickles before he's finally free.
"Follow me" he says and leads you through corridors that he probably remembers being taken through. The two of you eventually find a door with the words "DRAGON" embellished on it in gold letters. "I remember seeing this as they dragged me to that room" the digimon says, "and I think I heard roars in here earlier."
"Alright then" you say, opening the door. You then see a gigantic anthro dragon with his ankles in a gigantic set of stocks, and his arms chained above him. The walls are made of stone, and the gigantic dragon has his muzzle tied shut to prevent him from breathing fire. You look in awe at him before looking down at his feet. His feet are big, even proportionally to the dragon, and each toe is capped with a black claw. Around each claw a metal ring is fit, with a strong rope leading to the stocks, essentially leaving the dragon's toes helpless. As you look down the soles, you notice that otherwise, they are shaped similar to human feet, just gigantic and scaly. At the bottom of the stocks under the dragon's heels are the letters saying "Beldorf, Giant Dragon. Sent to the Tickle Mansion for the offense of crushing several huts and a store-house with these feet." As you look back up at the dragon, he wakes up and looks at you, his eyes adjusting to you. You approach the soles at Gargomon suddenly notices a note. "Hey, here's a note!" the digimon says, and he reads it. "It's from the ticklers," the digimon says, and then reads the note out loud. "This dragon happens to love being tickled. His sentence was over a month ago and he still insists on staying." Gargmon blinks. "This is one crazy dragon!" You look up at the dragon who smiles a bit, as much as the rope allows him to. You look to your left and see a rope labeled "Gag Removal", which is attached to a series of pullies and gears which lead to the rope around the muzzle, a machine that will remove the gag. You look to your right and you see a box full of innumerable tickle toys, including a feather of gigantic proportions, probably from some gigantic bird. What now?
12212122.title: Here there be dragons...

122121221.content:
You approach the dragon's feet as you look at his face, seeing him grin a bit. Then you look down at his soles, and then using your claws, being scratching lightly on the dragon's right sole. The dragon reacts instantly, giggling through the muzzle-ropes as his toes pull on the ropes, being nowhere close to tearing them. His chest shakes with laughter as you drag your claws over his surprisingly soft scales. Gargomon looks at you shaking his head as he goes to look out for people walking by the hallway.
You are now starting to scratch the dragon's soles faster and somewhat harder, and the dragon's giggles increase in proportion. You give him a break while you walk over to the toy barrel. Two things that stand out are the giant feather and a large scrubbing brush. Which do you use?
122121221.title: Tiny Claws Tickle Lots

122121222.content:
You pull the rope which then unties the dragon's muzzle-ropes, and the dragon clears his throat.
"Hello," he says, "I am Beldorf, but I guess you already knew that."
You nod, "So, uhh, why are you here?"
Beldorf replies, "Well, initially, I got careless and knocked over a few villages in my travels... but when I got sent here, at first you can imagine I was scared, but then after the first day, I found myself loving it here. Today is the third month of me being here beyond my term"
Gargomon scoffs, "You are ONE crazy dragon, Beldorf."
"I heard you the first time, rabbit." The dragon replies, "Just because you don't like to be tickled doesn't mean everybody doesn't like it"
Gargomon rolls his eyes and goes to watch the hallway.
"Really? You REALLY like this... uhh, torture?" You ask.
"Why yes, little Veemon. The thrill of the feather going across the soles as the sensations rack your brain making you laugh as hard as you can, and being helpless, too... that's what I like. Anyways, what are you doing here?"
"I just woke up in a room and found myself as a Veemon. I went down a hallway and turned right and found this gargomon, and then he led me down a separate hallway to you."
Beldorf laughs, "Well, that's quite a summary there. Well, then... if it isn't too much to ask..." He turns sheepish all of a sudden. "Can you please tickle my feet..?"
You agree to, of course, and then you look at the tickle-toy box and think...
Which tickle toy will you pull out?
122121222.title: Questioning

1221212221.content: You shoot the gun at the dragon. The dragon screams.
1221212221.title: Dragon Laughter

choices: Did you take the risk, running toward the door and jumped under it out of this r
Or did you stay because you see, that you can't escape without getting crush
1222.content:
This true hit your head hard as a iron bat. You are confused and rubbing your wings at each other nervously in search for hands. But you can't find them. The shock creeps very deep in your mind and you grab the mirror in anger and throwing it through the room.

The mirror crashed on the floor with a loud noise and the the light turns red suddenly. A voice shouts. "ALERT! ALERT! SUBJECT 7 BROKEN BOUNDS! SEAL WHOLE AREA!" Now, you had two choices, which you must decide fast because the door starts closing now:
1222.title: Hawkmon?

12221.content:
Your Decide was hard as iron. Nothing can stop you and you run toward the door, which start to close. You felt light and your new body allows you to run faster as you thought. The door was half way down and just as you would do it as a reflex, you jumped forward, not to reach the door but to glide on the air which blows over the ground. You slide out and stand up with a role. You are out! Unbelievable, you think. You look around but before you can notice, where you can go now, you got hit. You look st your wing and an arrow stucks in. You felt sleepy but saw some feet walking toward you. You fall in a black hole and you found yourself again somewhere, where the air was fresh and clean. You hung there on a Flag pole and your feet got bound down tighly. You starts giggling and then laughing as you felt, some other digimon tickle you. It was a couple of two Garudamon, which tickle your feet with their fingers.

One of them smiles. "Nice gift from our friend. He is soo ticklish. Did he can stand feathers?....." "Or did we try some other places...." Both think moaning the same time like they would be one mouth.
12221.title: Fresh air again

choices: They begin to brush your feet!
122211.content: The two Garudamon begin to wriggle the feathers across your bound soles, making your toes curl and your feet wiggle from side to side. You never knew that you were so ticklish and sensitive on your feet! Every swish of the feather made your feet and legs shiver with ticklishness, and your toes were wiggling every which way!
122211.title: Feathers

choices: You see them putting their tongues out
They appear to retreat and show mercy
1222111.content:
The feathers may have caused your soles to tingle tremendously, but when they both bring out the brushes, you know you are in real trouble.

Your big, helpless soles are no match for the long, rough brushes that they begin to torture them with. Every bristle can be felt scraping against your ticklish feet as you struggle to contain extremely loud laughter. Your toes frantically wiggle and your whole body squirms but there is no getting away from the brushes terrorising your bound feet. It felt as if they kept those devious brushes moving for at least half an hour, until your soles had reddened a little. Finally, they stop and your poor feet get a rest, but is that the end of the torture?
1222111.title: They begin to brush your feet!

choices: Did you die now? Is this really the end of you?
12222.content:
You see, that you can't escape under the door because it closed too fast. You heard the heavy locks closing and sealing the room and then, a fizzing noise. From out of the walls, a invisible gas streams in and as you continued breathing, you feel with each stroke your power flowing away. You feels dizzy now, and your legs felt like jelly. You moved forward the chair again. You must lay down somewhere but not on the hard floor.

You fall on the seat and your eyes stops working. Your heart beat slows down, slightly. Your ears stopped working and the fizzing noise moves far far away from you. You close your eyes and laid your head on the seat. Now, you think, you will die....
12222.title: Bad choice

122221.content: No. You don't die. Not Yet. Your heart beats slowly but don't stop working. But everything stayed dark around you. Only slowly, you start noticing something again.
122221.title: Survived?

1222211.content:
You sit against the chair and see a figure similar your bird form in kneeling in front of you. The figure hands puts a pill in your mouth and you accidentally swallow. Then you start getting less tired and you can make out the person, it's Biyomon! "You were starting to lose it, anymore of that gas and you could of died." says Biyomon. you see the gas is gone, and you say, "Why did you save me?"

"Is that anyway to thank someone?", says Biyomon, "Besides we need you for something."

"Whose we, and for what?"

"First, I must test something.", Biyomon lifts her foot and puts it on your face. You take her foot off, but when you look at it you freeze for a second. Biyomon wiggles her toes, and you decide to lick her sole slowly. Biyomon starts laughing and says, "Okay, Okay, that's enough, your perfect." She pulls her foot away, gets on her feet, and helps you up.

"Come with me, want you to help me and a friend with something."
1222211.title: Chosen

12222111.content:
Biyomon open a door and the two of you walk down and a hallway. You ask Biyomon, "By the way what happened to the alarms, alarms sounded when I got off the chair. Biyomon replied, "Do you really want to think about what whoever works here will do to you if you are found. You think she has a point.

The hallway ends with two doors. One door is labeled "three toes" and the other is labeled "four toes".

"What's this?" You ask.

Biyomon says, "Okay, here the deal. My friend with actually come later on, but now I want you to make a choice. The doors has a creature in there with feet like the door says, but I must tell you something. The three toes door, the creature has feet that are very ticklish, so the creature will laugh alot. The door with four toes has a creature with four toes, and the feet aren't as ticklish, but those feet with move alot more, like the toes will wiggle more. Now, choose a door."
12222111.title: Hard Decision

choices: Go for tickling her feet anyway
122221112.content:
"I'll take the four toes door.", you say
"Suit yourself, I'll go through the other one where my friend is.", Biyomon says

Both of you go to your respective doors. You were just about to open yours until Biyomon suddenly says, "Good luck.", then Biyomon go through her door and closes it. You quickly ponder what she said. Cautiously you open the door, go in, and quickly close it. You see a sleeping lion in a restraint chair like you were in before ( at the start of the story). In fear of lions you slowly walk closer to see the lion is adult Nala ( from the Lion King). You walk closer and you can see her sharp teeth as she is snoring, you slowly walk back to the door in fear. You try to open it, but it is locked. The snoring stop, you suddenly freeze, then a few seconds later you hear an angry growling sound. You turn around to see Nala is awake, but is growling angrily at you. You slowly walk to her, you can see her showing her teeth in anger. As you walk past her ankles she lets out a big roar, then you quickly hide behind her feet which is proped up by the chair. You look at her long feet, the toe claws are extended and she moves her feet around as if she wants to hit you.
122221112.title: The Lion Queen

choices: Activate It - maybe I can find out why she's so angry
Don't activate -  maybe I don't want to know
1222211121.content: You try calming Nala down, you look around the room and find a strange device in the far corner. It's labelled universal translator. You look around and see a small version of the devise around Nala's neck. they appear to be connected. You read a notice on the machine infront of you "Incase of Sharp Teeth use this machine to activate Translator Around Subjects Neck. You ponder over this for a minute, wondering if this would help you find out why Nala is so angry with you, the controlls are easy enought there's only two buttons "Activate" and "De-activate".
1222211121.title: Translator

choices: You release me afterwards and we escape together
I get to tickle you anywher i want for the same length of time you tickled me. t
12222111211.content:
You decide you have nothing to lose, and press the large button labelled "Activate", suddenly Nala's roars in the background are transformed into english and you can clearly hear her yelling, "Don't come any closer or you'll regret it."

You slowly walk over to the bound lioness and calmly ask whats wrong

"You're here to hurt me like the other" Nala growls angrily to you

"No I'm not" you reply " I'm just here to tickle you, I mean come on you are really cute" with that you notice the once angry lioness is calm and blushing.

"Really, you think I'm cute" Nala happily said "Ok then you can tickle me all you want on one condiion"

"Condition?" you reply to the grining Nala
Nala then anfter a few seconds answers "The condition is
12222111211.title: One Condition

122221112111.content:
... You release me afterwards and we escape together."

You give this some time to think about, you remember that Biyomon might be waiting for you. After giving it a little thought you look back at Nala's concerned gazed and reply with a grin,"Sure, I'll escape with you."

"Oh thank you, thank you, thank you.", Nala says happily,"Oh, but one more thing. Could you let me out of this restraint chair, it's not very comfortable." she says with a grin.

Okay you say, you first release the restraints on her shaking forepaws and belly, then you take the restraints off her ankles. You back off a little as she jumps off the chair to get a good stretch, the sound of her joints going back into place show that she has been here for a long time. After wiggling her toes into place she sinisterly grins and gets ready to pounce you. Surprised you back one step with your hands up, but then she pounces on you and gives you a mess of licks,"Thank you so much.", she says this as if you saved her life.

Playfully you tickle her ear and she rolls off of you on her back. You lay on her chest and say,"You must be pretty ticklish, that was just you're ear."

Nala starts blushing again,"I know, but can you tickle my tummy, I haven't eaten in a while and it feels a little upset.", Nala feels very relaxed now.

You look back at her propped up feet, then she says,"You can tickle my feetsies afterwords.", then she playfully wags her feet.

With a smile you reply,"Okay!"
122221112111.title: Help Nala

choices: You see a clear path to go down
1222211121111.content:
You turn to her belly, first you feel her belly, it's long, furry, and soft. She sucks her belly in a little and snickers,"Your wings tickle,", she chuckles,"and your feet-claws are tickling my sides." At this point you begin to brush your wings up and down her belly. First Nala was breathless, but then she lets out a big laugh. You softly brush the area where her bely and chest meet, this causes her to start shaking and wriggling. She rolls on to her side and you sit on the floor facing her tummy. You then scratch her tummy with your feet-claws, Nala pounds the ground with her paw for the laughter has left her breathless.

When your done you crawl over to Nala's face, petting her muzzle while she regains her breathe while smiling. When she does she says,"Okay, now my toesies and then we can leave." Nala give you a lick on the cheek, and then you crawl to her hind feet.

Nala's feet are so long and soft like a pillow, her foot is bigger than your head. You hug both the paws a nuzzle the right one with your cheek, Nala starts shaking and laughing again,"Your whole body is just too feathery." she says. You prop the paw pads on your head, her brown pads are soft and smooth on your head, this make Nala laugh even harder. You just grab her left foot you grab and spread her two right toes then tickle the inside with your beak. This causes her other toes to spread as well, she goes breathless again while trying to say stop. You start to rub your beak on the pad of the ball of her foot, then start brushing and pawing you with her other foot, although your feathers just tickle her more.

When you stop she says while breathing hardly "Please, that's enough." You were considering continuing, but when you see that her eyes are tearing you decide she has had enough. You go back to her face and rub the tears off her cheeks, I'm okay she says while trying to get her footing while standing up. She then sits down and massages her foot in front of you while snickering,"Sorry," she says, "I can still feel you tickle on my foot." That's okay you reply while watching her foot get massaged.

After a while you and Nala walk to the door. Nala bites off the lock, it scares you how strong she is. "Okay Hawkmon, let's get out of here." Smiling you open the door.
1222211121111.title: Pillow soft paws

choices: You take a wrong turn and get lost
12222111211111.content:
You get outside and look around for a way to go. "Hey, what about the path over there?" You look to where Nala said the path was. "Great, good job Nala. Let's get out of here," you say and then you both run down the path and disappear.

After walking for a long while, Nala says, "Wait a minute! I'm exhausted. Let's stop and rest for a while." "Alright," you reply. Then you both sit under the shade of a big tree. You are laying on your back, looking up at the clouds in the sky, when you look over to see Nala, also laying on her back but with her front paws raised over her head. You realize she has left her entire body vulnerable to a good tickling. You hesitate at first but you realize the oportunity is just too great to pass up.

You quietly sneak up to her. You look up at her face. Yes, her eyes are still closed. Then, without even second thought, you run your feathery wings all over Nala's poor tummy. Nala screames at the top of her lungs as she immediately began writhing and trying to get away. Finally, Nala playfully swipes at you, causing you to stop tickling her just long enough for her to roll away.

"OHH, that was the most intense tickling I have ever gotten," Nala said panting. "I'm sorry Nala, I just couldn't resist. You are just so cute when you are being tickled." Nala blushes slightly, "Yeah well, we should probably keep going, huh?" "Yes, let's go." you say and then you and Nala keep walking.
12222111211111.title: You see a clear path to go down

choices: Nala's too enraged, I probably can't stop her
12222111211112.content:
Surprised you jumped back on Nala's muzzle,"Oh! Biyomon!"
"Yeah, me and my friends are tired from tickling, by the way, how was the lioness? Was she scary?"
Before you could answers you feel Nala breathing deeply and growling on your back, turn to see Nala angry again. Nala then jumps and pounces on Biyomon, Biyomon let out a big scream and then fainted in shock. "She was one of the ones that hurt me.", Nala said in a demoniacally angry voice. Nala's teeth were fully exposed as she pinned Biyomon to the floor; you froze right there thinking that Nala might killed her. Nala opens her mouth and grabs Biyomon's arm with her teeth, it looks like she is going to bite her wing off.

Taking a calm deep breath you soon start to crawl ontop of him until you are straddled onto Rogers waist. Using your legs to wrap around Rogers body to keep you from falling off of him.

"If you really want to get caught again, you can look for your shoes. I would rather escape, if you don't mind."

"Not a clue. I just escaped from a chair down the hall, too."

"Let's try this door!" Before you have a chance to stop him, the Yoshi throws a door open with a plaque that reads "private relaxation chambers." He waves you over and you step into an obnoxiously padded (and lavishly carpeted) circular room. A large snack table stands in the center of the room, and several doors line the edges.

"Maybe we can relax for a while. I don't see any cameras." The Yoshi has enough sense to keep his voice down.

"The sign said 'private relaxation rooms' and the door we came from doesn't match the others." Yoshi juggles the pile of food around and manages to open a door with his tongue. You grab a few things and follow him in.

You step into a small and mellow red room. This circular room has a ring of red pillows lining the bottom edge and rediculously thick shag carpet on the floor. You can only guess about this room's true purpose.

Yoshi is lounged back and picking up cupcakes- with his tongue- and flinging them into his mouth. His hands are busy rubbing his paws.

"Wwwha woown wiw yoww fuuh?"

You step through a heavy glass door into the most bizarre room you've ever seen. A hallway runs farther than you can see with several more jutting off to the sides. Gigantic glass windows line the walls, all facing downwards at an angle. The strange part is that, below the windows for the entire length of the hall, is a long line of feet. Human feet, small furry paws, fleshy dragon feet, long bunny feet, and every other kind of foot sticks out from the walls at an upward angle without even a hint of movement. Yoshi steps ahead of you and looks straight over a set of familiar looking paws and into a window.

"Look at this," he mumbles under his breath while waving you over. It's bugs bunny! Apparently, he's reading a book while munching absentmindedly on a carrot. Nearby, sylvester is curled up on a bed. And you have their feet, right in front of you. Down in the room, their legs simply end at their ankles; it appears that more fur covers the cutoff as if they never had feet to begin with. The tazmanian devil and Daffy Duck are down there too, although you question the sense behind it based on the boring duck feet standing to your left. You lightly tickle Sylvester's paws, and he stirs in his sleep, chuckling to himself.

123122211111111.content:
And so it goes, on and on. The rickety ride takes you through feather tunnels, up inclines lined with banks of rotating bristles on the floor, past sprayers that cover your feet and sides in oils, and through passages lined animatronic statues that move and tickle you when you least expect it, the restraints themselves sometimes shifting and twisting slightly to move you about.
         You go through the underside of towering arches, up vertical walls and drops, through meandering galleries and narrow paths, tickled and tingling all the while. It's torturous, but there's something fun to it in a way. Not necessarily in the tickling in of itself, but in the anticipation. In seeing whirling, spinning dusters jutting from the floor ahead, knowing that they'll tickle heckishly when you reach them, but yet being given ample time to squirm before reaching them. With your speed, the feathers, brushes, pinwheels, and other goodies act intensely on your feet, sides, and underarms while I contact, but also are gone before they truly start their work. The combination of extreme ticklish feelings and long stretches of recovery while dreading the next trick or stretch of ride is an odd one, especially when applied in the long run. To say nothing of the culmative wooziness of your wild trip, combined with your rapidly changing surrounding and the bizarre feature/color schemes of the tunnels.

         After what feels like it is indeed the several days that the inventor taunted you with earlier, the cart finally slides back our onto the cavernous testing floor, this time in a different corner than the first one. The restraints unsnap, and, giggling, the both of you stagger from the machine. Your fur is heavily ruffled and Yoshi's scales are faint red all over from the experience, but for the most part you aren't feeling raw with the tickling.

         As you stand around in the midst of the exotic mechanical paraphernalia, the blue skinned scientist lopes up to you.
         "And how do you two enjoy that? When you get back, you'll be able to tell the higher-ups we haven't had a cent pass through here that hasn't been well used." He says with some apparent pride, though you privately wonder at the value of two massive, tickle-themed rollercoasters.

Yoshi speaks up for the both of you. "Thank-you for showing us your lab; it's quite impressive, but..."
123122211111111.title: "That'll be 5$ for the ride."

"The wha..?"

Mina raises an eyebrow at her fellow's method, heedlessly pulling your toes back and toying with the arch of her own captive foot, and your laughing reaches a new pitch. Amy looks up from her work briefly to smile bashfully at her. "It actually doesn't taste so bad, Meen, you should try it!" Mina sloly nods and dubiously begins licking at the sole of your paw, hesitantly, but soon with greater gusto.

Roaring with laughter, with both Rouge and Sally now skittering their fingers over your helpless belly, threatening to dip into your navel at any moment, you throw your head back and crush your eyes closed, silently begging for it to end. And fatefully...

His hands are oversized and they have sharp looking fingers, his feet look like he’s wearing boots but they are the same color as his skin, his head is long and pointed with two horn like things that come out the top and a beard looking thing coming out his chin his face reminds you of a jester, the rest of his body is the same basic shape of a human male of around 20, He waits until he’s right next to you to answer your question.

“That’s all very interesting but what does this all have to do with me and what role do you play in this?” you continue to walk with him feeling something you can’t quite put your finger on.

124111211.content:
You trail the gemini down another corridor, this one boasting a series of pleasant bay windows down the side. A warm red light coasts in from the transparent portals, making you think of sunsets and tropical beaches. Idly, you pause to look out the first.
          The window is set several stories up in the building; and the view is incredible. The sight is aided by the grassy, gently sloping terrain outside the window; the site is apparently situated on the apex of a long ridge, with the ground running slowly to a distant deciduous forest. The forest stretches out as far as you can see, becoming lost in open fields and other tracts of indistinguishable terrain; there is a noticeable lack of other artificial structures. While strangely disquieting, you don't draw much conscious attention to that particular detail.

         Uphill, the terrain... Stops. In it's stead, the ground plunges down to an ocean, painted in various warm shades, ranging from dour crimson to festive gold, by the setting sun. Said star is in the process of ducking behind the horizon directly opposite the window, forcing you to squint,and already half buried in the molten light of the water. The scene is quite pretty, but it somehow seems strangely threatening when you notice the huge, curved, lightly glowing line etched into the sky straight above. You stare at it for a few seconds, wondering if it's some strange cloud formation, the sunlight shining into your eyes hindering your efforts.

         "Uh... Ayame, what's that up there?" You ask slowly, feeling a bit foolish.
         'What?" Having gotten head of you as you stop to sight see, she quickly retraces her steps to view the object of your interest.
         "That? That's just a moon. Kaylangya, I believe." She starts back up the hallway, clearly eager to continue.
         "Oh. Just wondered, I've never seen it so big before. At least now I know what you call the moon around here."
          "what do you mean by 'The moon'? I thought I said a moon. As I said, it's probably Kalangya. It always waxes this time of year."
          "Yeah but, but the Ka-watcha, what?"
          "Don't they have moons where you come from?" She glances back at you, seeming mildly amused.
          You direct another mystified glance at the lunar silhouette. "Er, yes- no. Uh, I mean, we only have the one..."
          Her pace barely slows as she approaches the next door. "Really? Sounds kinda dull if you ask me."
          "Uh, we get by."

         Dazed by the reminder of where you are, and the even more important reminder of where you aren't, you finally follow your guide through to the next room. I brings to mind some kind of museum exhibit. It's high ceilinged with lots of glass-covered tables and glass-shelved walls, all stuffed with variety of mementos, and with a number of three-walled other rooms leading off it into various sub-chambers.
         "Here is our gallery of tickling-related artifacts, I'm sure some areas will be familiar to you." She says, beaming and obviously proud of the expansive collection. "This room over here is devoted to feathers; the biggest feathers known to sapient, the ones with the best combo of stiffness and flexibility, feathers that secrete hyper-senesetivity inducing dust, feathers that make funny sounds when you use them, etc." She pivots gracefully. "And over there we have been granted stewardship of some historically important restraints," She pats a set of time-worn stocks lovingly. "These beauties are all the way from Gallangla Alpha; they kept people laughing for over 260 000 hours all told. -And over here..." A mischievous grin lights her face. "An interactive display." You fly into the darkness and hit your head on something, but it gives way. You then discover that you're in the ventilation shaft. You start crawling. "Hey get back here. SOUND THE ALARM ONE ESCAPED!" You can hear the robot say. You crawl as fast as your body and limited space will allow. After about a couple yards you fall through the grating and hit the floor with a thud. You wheeze and chuckle to yourself. "ow." You whisper to yourself. You look around and see a dream come true. In front of you is an enormous garage door and all around you is various cars, from military vehicles to super cars. Hearing an alarm in the distance you jump up and head toward the closest car to you. You reach for the handle and surprisingly the car is unlocked. You hop in and look at the ignition and see that your hopes have just been crushed, no key. Suddenly you hear footsteps and creaking. You look in your Land Rover's side-view mirror and see the door opening.

You......
124112.title: On the wings/wheels of freedom

1241122.content:
The driver's side door opens and you are grabbed with your arms pinned at your sides. You see the robot staring sadistically at you. "I should have told you the punishment for attempting to escape." The robot chuckles. You're visibly shaking in fear. "Don't worry, you'll like it." The robot assures you. He then carries you into a room with a chair and a table with various tickle related instruments. He plops you into the chair and metal restraints snap up around your hands and ankles. You struggle against them pointlessly. "Oooh." The robot says, getting your attention. "This one is a prototype, still going through testing. You will love this one!" The robot says. Then he picks up a chainsaw and starts it. You panic and thrash around in your restraints. The robot presses a button and your chair levels out to be more bed-like. He goes to your feet, revving the chainsaw the whole way. He begins to put the chainsaw to your left foot. Right before he makes contact you scream. "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!" Then your screaming turns to uncontrollable laughter. You get tickled until you think you're about to suffocate when it stops. "HAHAHA!" The robot laughs at you. You look up at him. "YOU SHOULD'VE SEEN THE LOOK ON YOUR FACE!" He stops to laugh. "You were all like: OH CRAP HE'S GONNA RIP ME APART WITH A CHAINSAW!" He continues to laugh. You catch your breath. "Silly dragon, everything in here is designed for tickling, not gory murder! Here look!" He presses a button and your left paw is freed. The robot comes to your side an holds up the inactive chainsaw. "Feel." He says. You reach up and touch the chainsaw's blade. It's made of rubber with little soft bristles on the end to create a pretty tickly sensation. You heave a sigh of relief. "I thought I was about to be shredded." You chuckle. You finally relax and allow your muscles to stretch out. You had been tensed up and were trying to break out of your restraints.

You close your eyes and let your head rest when........
1241122.title: The terrible tickling

1242.content:
You realise you are a chameleon! Cool! You then blend into your surroundings to avoid getting caught. Then you run through the corridor.

Along the way you see a door labeled: Koopa Kids. You wonder if you should open it or keep walking.
1242.title: A Chameleon!

12422.content: Moving on, you find a door that says: "King Koopa AKA Bowser". You then realise that all off the Mario characters are being held in this corridor.
12422.title: Koopa Path

124221.content: You enter the door to Bowser, and you see the Koopa King, his arms raised above his head in shackles, his feet in stocks, asleep. You wanted to wake him up, but how?
124221.title: The King.

choices: Let him go, maybe he can help you!
Keep tickling him! Make him suffer!
1242211.content:
You lightly scratch his foot, just to wake him up. He starts shaking and muttering. You starts scribbling down his soles, and he starts bursting with laughter.

"BWAHAHAHAHA! NO! STOP! PLEHEHEHESE!" The Koopa King laughed.

You stopped.

Bowser started breathed heavily. "Thank you."

You asked what happened.

Bowser replied "I don't know, I was about to take away that pesky plumber's last life, then both of us say Peach, knocked out, being dragged away. Then the last thing I know, I was knocked out. and I was dragged here. These 2 goons tickled me like crazy, until I passed out. That's all I remember."

You had a choice, possibly escape together. Or have more fun with the tough Bowser?
1242211.title: Tickle, tickle!

12422112.content:
"Who'd have thought it? Big Bowser ticklish?!" You say shaking your head, examining him.
"I know, It's a secret weakness! Now let me go please!" He replies, a scared expression on his face.
You walk up to Bowser, and stop in between his two huge feet. You look him in the eyes and say, "Naaaaaaa..." in a very playful voice, as you trail a finger up his foot.
He yelps, "I'll make you regret this!" He shouts, anger and fear mixed in his eyes,
"If you ever get out!" You exclaim, laughing, still running a singular finger from the top to bottom of his foot and then back up again before repeating, Bowser is giving out small giggles, occasionally yelping as you hit the sweet spot on his ticklish foot.
"Anyway, Lets see how ticklish the big tough king here really is!" You say in a very mocking baby voice. Bowser is blushing furiously, clearly embarrassed by his situation. "Let me out! I'm gonna get that bitch for putting me in he-" He shuts up realizing what he has just said, You raise an eyebrow, pausing the tickling, "You got captured by Peach didn't you!" Bowser is now beetroot red. You laugh at the irony of the situation. "Well i guess she got revenge!" You exclaim.
A thought trickles across the back of your mind, "Maybe i could get her to help me... I would love to see how Bowser is around Peach in this predicament!"
For a moment you think, until you realize Bowser has now started to relax, back in his restraint. you shake your head and spider your hand down his right foot, he jumps up again, yelping. I notice that the "Goons" have left their tickling equipment behind, including brushes, feathers, oil and for some reason, four bottles of water. I guess Bowser get's softer with water... You eye the tools, while still absent-mindedly running hands up Bowser's right foot. For a moment you think, and then suddenly you hear a noise behind you and someone enter's the room - it is...
12422112.title: Keep tickling him! Make him suffer!

124222.content: You enter the next room, and see a sign that says "Yoshi" and another sign that says, "New section ahead" Do you go in, or check out the new section?
124222.title: Yoshi!?

1242221.content:
You walk in, and see a green Dinosaur like creature, which you assume is Yoshi. He is strapped down on to a chair that, honestly, looks very comfortable without the metal clamps on it. Yoshi is fast asleep, snoring a little, so you approach quietly so you don't wake him yet. You are now right in front of the foot of the chair, and you see that Yoshi is wearing brown boots. You would have thought that they had been removed, but apparently they had not.

Either way, you decide that since you are here, you might as well have some fun. You kneel down and begin to remove Yoshi boots. Right after you remove them, Yoshi starts waking up. He looks around and notices you.

"W-what are you doing there!?" Yoshi shouts.

You stop for a moment, still holding Yoshi boots. You look at them, then at Yoshi's bare feet and then at Yoshi's face. You.........
1242221.title: Helpless Yoshi

1242222.content: The next room has a sign that says Mario and Luigi in big red and green letters there are plenty of rooms from that point on but this one seems like the center of the room
1242222.title: New section!

125.content: As you glance at the mirror you see you are a Treecko. What's going on you think in fear and confusion. In this state you run through the door in the front of the room. You stop run for a while to catch breath, you see a fork in the path. The two paths have labels, the first path is labeled "Lugia", and the second is labeled "Rukario".
125.title: Pokemon #252

choices: Be nice and give Lugia a foot massage
1251.content:
You walk down a brief, dark hallway. As you walk you hear a loud yelling noise, you carefully walk onward to find a door, inside the room is where the noise is coming from. You open the door, you see a Lugia yelling and moving recklessly. You get scared and jump back, but then you see it is bound to the floor with it wings tied up and legs bound to the floor too. Lugia look very angry though. Then Lugia spots you, you freeze in fear for a second. It start yelling at you, but little bit calmer. You walk over to it, you stare at him still yelling at you until you something blocks him from your point vision. You look at it and fall back. You stare at his large white feet, they were about twice your size with three toes that are about one fourth the height of his feet. They curve down to you as if Lugia was trying to stomp you for a second, but the retrain is stop Lugia from stomping you so he slightly moves his feet back.

When you start listening to Lugia somehow you can understand what it's saying. It wasn't trying to stomp you, it wanted a foot massage. It was telling you it doesn't like to get tickled which was what one person was earlier. You start thinking.
1251.title: Lugia path

12511.content: You start gently massaging Lugias feet, and it begins to calm down. You realize what fun it would be to free Lugia and watch it tear up the corridors. Should you, though?
12511.title: Footy footy

125111.content:
You release the lugia. It ignores you and destroys the whole way you came in. You laugh a bit about this and go through another corridor.

At the end of the corridor, you can't believe what your seeing!
125111.title: Destruction!

choices: try to get in the sock
1251111.content: Its a...a... REALLY BIG SOCK!!! ITS SHAPED LIKE A... A... SOCK, OH MY GOD!!!!
1251111.title: tsk tsk tsk...

choices: Go for one of their feet
Wait and see what they will do with you
12511111.content:
You go into the sock (like you have a choice). You reach the end of the sock, and nothing happens. Then the sock starts to move, you hear voices:

voice 1 "Hey I found a sock!"
voice 2 "Wow, it just our size."
voice 1 "I think I'll try it on."
voice 3 "Are you sure? Who knows where that's been."
voice 2 "Don't be such a worrywart, let him try it on."

Then a giant blue foot goes inside the sock, it has three nail claws and is almost twice your size. The toes wiggle through as it guides itself in the sock, one of the claws touches your belly and the foot quickly get out.

voice 1 "Hey, Vaporeon was right, something is in here."
voice 3 "I told you."
voice 2 "Okay, Veemon get it out."

A giant blue hand take you out of the sock. You are shocked by what you see. A macro Agumon, a macro Veemon, and a female macro, semi-anthro Vaporeon.

Vaporeon "Aww, he's so cute."
Agumon "You think almost everything is cute."
Vaporeon grabs you out of Veemon's hand.
Vaporeon "And look at his little green feet."
Vaporeon tickles your feet, you snicker a little.
Veemon "Hey guy come over here for a second."

Vaporeon puts you down, smiles at you, pat you on the head, walk to the others. The three huddle together and talk about what to do with you. The you see their feet are exposed behind them. You walk around examining the feet. Then you think.
12511111.title: 3 Giants

125111112.content:
you wait and they sto huddleing one picks you up and sets you in the midle of a long hallway. a poof of smoke comes and you sudenly are tied to the ground in a spread eagle. "Please dont do this to me guys!" you scream. "oh, hush its okay, we just wanna see you smile!" they say
one stradles your waist "AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
whats next . . . she tickles your
125111112.title: Wait and see what they will do with you

12511112.content:
Do I really need to explain what happened? You knew what was coming when you clicked on this. You're dead. And even worse, you never got to know where you are, why you are here and why you are a Treecko.

The end.
12511112.title: You're dead!

1251112.content:
Directly in front of you is an absolutely giant Pikachu head. Taking up the entire end of the hall, the Pikachu chatters angrily at you in a voice no deeper than a normal pikachu's. He is obviously well restrained, with his neck poking through a hole in the floor. So, you approach him. Only feet away now, his chattering subsides and he sighs miserably. From this distance, you can see that a pair of thin disks on his cheeks are intercepting any charge he could produce. Any fear you may have has subsided; you gently pet the creature on the cheeck, and it gently weeps.

A diagram to your side catches your attention now. A crude geometic plate depicts the Pikachu's head on one floor, its torso directly below it, and its feet yet another story down.
1251112.title: The Megachu

12511122.content: Directly next to the plate is a set of stairs leading downwards. Below the plate, however, is a switch simply labeled "Activate carousel." The captive cries behind your back when he sees you considering the options.
12511122.title: Carousel?

125111222.content: You flip the switch and a deafening hum fills the hall. With it, the frenzied crying of the Pikachu. The way back down the hall is suddenly gated off and a warning siren sounds. The section of the hall visably moves away from the rest. It glides about 30 feet away before descending several more. The lights dim and you become disoriented until relative silence and light take over. The walls have fallen away now to reveal an area 50 feet across. Pikachu sobs silently now, and you begin to realize why. Two large, yellow masses have taken residence behind you, which you circle to investigate. In front of the Pikachu's head to either side and facing away are his torso and feet. His torso is to the left with arms shackled to the ceiling; still struggling. To the right lies his butt and enormous soles; center toes kept upright with thin restraints. You don't know why, but you have a sudden urge to tickle the hell out of him.
125111222.title: Carousel!

choices: try to put his head back on
leave the poor dead thing there
125112.content: You go in for the tickel, lugia screams and starts to cry in laughter. You start to tickel harder and OOPS lugia is dead...your tickeling murdered him. I'm afraid he laughed his head off...AHHH!
125112.title: oops... sorry

choices: Use Bullet Seed on the wing holding your legs?
Let Lugia get away with his plan of tickling you?
1251122.content:
You turn away from the body and make your way to door of where you just came in but what you don't know is that Lugia knew the move `Recover.' You are about to exit when you feel something something soft and feathery wrap around your green ankles.
You are then lifted off your feet and stare into the eyes of the revived Lugia. You hang upside down with your feet held together and looking at Lugia.
The Lugia grins slightly as if to say `Now its my turn!' You begin to panic and try to thrash about but you remember that the Lugia is stronger than you and your legs are tied together.
Then using its other wing, Lugia pulls two white feathers from his tail and holds them as if they were two cards in his hand. He then places them onto the soles of your feet and begins lightly brushing them up and down your feet.
You try to hold your breath but the tickling sensation is just too much for you!
You're laughing so hard now that you are bursting into tears. You are not sure about how to get off this mess.

You have one idea, but will it work?
1251122.title: Lugia's Revenge

1252.content: Immediately, the road forks again! To one side lies a lighter path and to the other a much darker path.
1252.title: More Forks!

12521.content: This path is well-lit, you walk down and you don't feel as scared anymore with every step. After you've walked about 100 meters you fall into a trapdoor. You scream in fear that this might be a deathfall, but you land on something that cushions your fall. You see you've landed on a big purple dragon sole that is five times your size, the sole looks like it's from Wheezie (the purple dragon in Dragon Tales). You also see the leg is fed through a hole in the wall. Coming from the other side of the hole you can hear Wheezie crying.
12521.title: Weezie!

choices: "Yeah, I want to get out of this place."
"If there are others with feet like yours, I'll stay."
125211.content:
You slide off the soft purple foot and knock on the wall. "Hello, are you okay in there?", you ask. Then the giant purple foot raises high in the air ready to stomp on you. You have no place to run, your legs begin to shake as you stare at the giant purple sole, you try a Bullet Seed attack on the foot, but the foot is to thick to feel it. Finally it falls down toward you, you are going to be stomped by the toe, you cower into a fetal position, then the foot hits you. You're not dead, but somebodys foot is on your head. Shaking you look up to see a Rukario propping his foot on your head. "You may be a coward, but your head sure is soft on my feet." he says then rubs his toes all over your face, but you push him off.

"Where is the purple dragon Wheezie, she was about to kill me.",You say

Rukario sits down with you grinning,"You coward, that was my illusion spell." Rukario then rubs the side of your head and cheek with his toe." I was just playing around with you.", with this said Rukario guides his toe to your mouth and presses it inside your mouth, wiggles it around a little making his pink pawpad touch your tongue and then quickly puts it out."I know you can't resist feet nor tickling, nobody in this place can, however you were the only one who care about the crying before wanting Wheezie's foot, you should feel special."

"What are you planning to do to me, Rukario?", you ask

Rukario pokes his other foot on to your stomach,"First off, I'd prefer it you called Lucario.",saying this he wiggles his toes on your stomach making you snicker, then he stops. "Second, I'm going to help through this mansion; either we'll get out of here or we won't. So what do you say?" Your press Lucario's foot on your stomach, feeling the paw pads, then you reply...
125211.title: New partner

1252112.content:
You could'nt help yourself. This was about the only place in the multi dimensional universe that is specifically for tickling and feet and without being viewed as a weirdo.
"I'd love to stay as long as feet like these are around!" Lucario smiles and 'Says follow me then to explore then."
1252112.title: "If there are others with feet like yours, ...

12522.content:
The path continues to dim as you continue, and you soon have a feeling of claustrophobia. You begin to crawl on your hands and knees until you come to a thick grate. You shove it loose only to fall into a room comprised mostly of brushed aluminum. A myriad of bizarre stocks line the length of the hallway, most with a pokemon in them. Some cry out to you, some snarl, and others still try their best to ignore you.

"Hey, get me out of this thing!" pleads a distressed Charmander, his voice echoing amongst the metal.
12522.title: The Restraining Room

125221.content: You find a Charmander in the strangest restraint you have ever seen. Knees tucked to chin, arms locked akimbo at the sides, and soles facing straight forward, the creature produces the most striking puppy eyes imaginable, along with an audible whimper. "Please get me out of here! Just hit one of those buttons!" Along side the unit are two shining and important-looking buttons. You should probably just help him out.
125221.title: Charmander's Dilemna

1252211.content: You push the black button, waiting to see the how this contraption operates. You and the Charmander are surprised when thin, flexible, metal rods jet out from in between the the Charmander's toes, tightly pulling them back to the stocks. "What?!" the Charmander says, completely shocked. A drawer that was previously concealed underneath the restraint flew open quickly, worrying the Charmander even more. The sleek drawer is full of feathers, hairbrushes, and electric toothbrushes. You pick up a feather and wave it menacingly in front of the poor Charmander. "N-no... please...," the Charmander begs. "I don't know, your cute soles are very tempting!" you reply.
1252211.title: The Black Button

12522111.content: "Alright, I'll be nice," you say, laying the feather down. "T-thank you," the Charmander says happily. "Try pressing the white button," the Charmander asks.
12522111.title: Deciding to help

125221111.content: You press the white button, and in response, the part of the restraint that locked the Charmander's arms akimbo releases. "Erm... try the black one maybe?" the Charmander says. You push the black button, but this time leather straps jet out from the wall and tie the Charmander's arms taut to his sides. "These stupid buttons are so confusing!" you vent. "Just keep trying," the Charmander says. You press the buttons fruitlessly as parts of the device unlock and restrain the Charmander. "Come on..." you mutter under your breath as you press the buttons in vain. "Watch out!" the Charmander suddenly shouts urgently. "Huh?" you say as you look around in confusion. Suddenly, you feel a sharp pain in the back of your neck as you black out. When you come to your senses, you realize you are in...
125221111.title: Stupid Buttons

12522112.content: You slowly drag the down feather across the Charmander's soft restrained soles. The poor creature's toes wiggle and squirm as much as they can in the tight restraints. The Charmander erupts into laughter as you stroke their delicate soles with the soft feather. You drag the feather all over and in between the Charmander's soft toes as they squeal with intense laughter. "NOAHAHAHA! PLEASE! S-STOP!" the Charmander gasps in between intense laughing. "Hmm... I'll have to think about that," you say.
12522112.title: Charmander's Predicament

125221121.content:
Although the Charmander's pleading sounds desperate, the sheer cuteness of his ticklish feet makes it very difficult to put a stop to the tickling. You continue feathering his poor orange soles for a few more minutes, but then cant resist a little hands-on fun. You put your fingers gently on his toes and stroke all the way down his soles, which manages to make his laughter even louder and his squirming to become much more vigorous.

Still ignoring his begging, your teasing fingers keep digging in to his soft soles more, forcing his toes to clench and his soles to wrinkle around your hand in a vain attempt to squirm away. He looks like he is getting pretty tired, but his feet sure aren't getting any less cute.
125221121.title: Even more tickles

1252211211.content:
You find yourself unable to resist the cute soles of the Charmander, and continue raking your fingers over his soft feet. He pushes and tugs at the cords restraining his toes as you drag your fingers down the thick sides of his soles. You decide to step things up, and you reach into the drawer and pull out a large, thick brush.

"No, please! Just let me out of here!" the Charmander pleads.

"Nah, I'm good." you say, as you rub the brush over his orange soles.

He erupts into laughter as each individual bristle sweeps across his hypersensitive feet, tickling him beyond belief. You rapidly drag the brush back and forth, with the cords tying his toes back stretching each sole out, exposing it for your tickle pleasure. His laughter intensifies, and he struggles to escape his restrictive bonds. This continues on for about 15 minutes until the Charmander is at a point where he can barely breathe, gasping for air. He passes out, unable to take the severe tickling. His feet are reddened and chafed, and look like they're quite tense.
1252211211.title: Breaking point

1252212.content:
You smack the white button and, instead of releasing the creature, a powerful buzzing sound emanates from the unit along with slight movement in the unit. Suddenly, part of the unit, along with his panicked feet, detaches itself from the rest of the restraint and parks the soles right in front of your face. In terror, he shrieks and kicks you right in the nose.

"Sorry, sorry, sorry!! Please hit that other button so we can escape!"
1252212.title: In front of your face

choices: Hit the button and let him out
Wait for him to wake up
12522122.content:
You look at the adorable little feet for a moment before looking back up at the charmander.

"Do you have any idea how cute these are?" you ask him. He replies with a high-pitched whine.

Without wasting another moment you drag your tongue across a sole and charmander loses all control. Your tongue goes back and forth, slobbering all over, and you even scratch around with your fingers a little bit. The feet weakly protest, curling and recoiling, but you have little problem keeping them in place. You lick all the way up to right under the toes and charmander is shrieking wildly. Looking up through his toes you see the poor creature thrashing and pulling at his restraints as if it will do some good. Maybe he's trying to plead, but it's hard to tell.

You let the creature calm down for a moment to regain its breath. Then you grab one of his paws around the back to steady it and wickedly claw your fingers down its trembling, wrinkling sole. Charmander screams desperately and collapses into a giggle fit. You explore his paws for a while longer, until charmander passes out from exhaustion, and you even keep licking the paws for a little while after that.

Now what?
12522122.title: Make him laugh

125222.content: You come across a strange sight: three Pikachus in a row are locked into a single set of stocks. There is a small one smiling placidly at you, a medium one who is asleep, and a larger one (although not by much) who is struck by fear at your sight.
125222.title: Three Chu's

1252221.content:
As soon as you approach, the small one speaks. "Hey, if you let me out of here I'll help you tickle the other two!"

The big one panics: "Same for me, same for me! Let me out of here and I'll tickle whoever you want!"

The average-sized one is still asleep.
1252221.title: Crossing over

12522212.content: You would like to let one go, but you couldn't get this oppertunity like THIS again! You start by tickling one of them, but who?
12522212.title: Not a chance!

1252222.content:
You ignore the Pikachu's, whom reacted to your negligence with desperation.

"Please! Help us! We need to get out of here!" One of them pleaded. You were about to decide to release them when you notice that he smirked for a second. A normal pokémon wouldn't be able to notice it, especially in this darkness, but your keen eyesight granted you this valuable information.

"You're planning something," you remarked, much to his surprise. "W-What? Me? No way! I couldn't do anything to harm the person who frees me from here!"

"Then why are you so nervous?" You questioned, and the Pikachu gulped. The Pikachu on the other side bent his head back in hopelessness. "In any case, I sense a danger that will come if I release you. So good bye." You walk further away from the pleading Pikachu, in search for an exit.

"No! Please come back!" The Pikachu pleaded again. "Just give it up, man. He's not coming back," the other Pikachu said. The first Pikachu hung his head in defeat, as tears fell from his eyes and darkened the already dark brick floor.

You stand one spot and carefully observe the walls for any doors or exits. After about two minutes, you see an outline of a door. It's faint, but nevertheless it's there, and that was all you needed to know, for now at least. You walk towards the door and grope around for the knob. Naturally it was at your right hand's side, and you quickly found it and turned the knob. When you opened the door, you made a serious mistake. You ran into the jailer, and quickly did a back dash. It was a yellow digimon, specifically a Renamon that stood before you with an alarmed look.

"Hey! What're you doing outside the cages?" She yelled. Instantly you turned around and made a run for it, and you hear her saying, "Come back here!" You ran as fast as you could, and you could see the small crawlspace from which you came. Without even looking back you performed a slide kick into the hole.

"Dammit! He got away!" Renamon screamed in frustration. She pulled out some sort of walky-talky and began talking into it. "All guards be on alert. There is an escapee running around, a Treecko. Find him."

You breathed a sigh of relief, but it quickly dissipated when you found out you were in the wrong position in the crawlspace. You were on your back, and you were facing the wrong direction. On top of that, the crawlspace was too tight to readjust your position. So you used your arms with some assistance from your legs to drag your body through the crawlspace, using the walls as a foothold. As you felt more room over your feet, suddenly...
1252222.title: The Jailer

info.brief_description: You wake up in a mansion where everything just happens to do with tickling.
info.description:
If you like tickling furries, scalies, paws, or anything like it, this is the story for you. Let's try to keep this somewhat clean.

Feel free to add any cartoon cameos you want.
